entry.title: 公司金融
entry.content:
这里我想弄一个公司金融cheatsheet，整理一些公式，它们都很简单但很琐碎，很容易忘。不过这仅仅是辅助中的辅助，用途有限，平时还是要在平板上做笔记，也要适当做题

Chapter 2

  1. Revenue - Expense = Income (2.2)
  2. Net working capital (NWC) = Current assets - Current liabilities (2.4)
  3. Operating cash flow (OCF) = EBIT + Depreciation - Taxes (2.5)
  4. Capital spending 1 = Purchase of fixed assets - Sales of fixed assets
  5. Capital spending 2 = (End_fix - Beg_fix) + Depreciation
  6. CF of the firm = OCF - Capital spending - Additions to NWC

Chapter 3

  1. 流动性ratio

\[ \colorbox{yellow}{\text{Current ratio}} = \frac{\text{Current assets}}{\text{Current liabilities}}\tag{3.2} \]

\[ \colorbox{yellow}{\text{Quick ratio}} = \frac{\text{Current assets}-\color{red}{\text{Inventory}}}{\text{Current liabilities}} \]

\[ \colorbox{yellow}{\text{Cash ratio}} = \frac{\color{red}{\text{Cash}}}{\text{Current liabilities}} \]

  1. 杠杆ratio

\[ \colorbox{yellow}{\text{Total debt ratio}} = \frac{\text{Total assets}- \text{Total equity}}{\text{Total assets}}\tag{3.2} \]

\[ \colorbox{yellow}{\text{Debt/Equity ratio}} = \frac{\text{Total debt}}{\text{Total equity}} \]

\[ \colorbox{yellow}{\text{Equity multiplier}} = \frac{\text{Total assets}}{\text{Total equity}}=1+\colorbox{pink}{\text{Debt/Equity ratio}} \]

  1. 偿债ratio

\[ \text{Times interest earned}=\frac{EBIT}{\text{Interest}} \]

\[ \text{Cash coverage}=\frac{EBIT+\text{Depreciation}+\text{Amortiztion}}{\text{Interest}} \]

  1. 存货ratio

\[ \text{Inventory turnover}=\frac{\color{red}{COGS}}{\text{Inventory}} \]

\[ \text{Days' sales in inventory}=\frac{365}{\text{Inventory turnover}} \]

  1. 应收ratio

\[ \text{Receivables turnover}=\frac{\color{red}{\text{Sales}}}{\text{Accounts receivables}} \]

\[ \text{Days' sales in receivables}=\frac{365}{\text{Receivables turnover}} \]

  1. 总资产turnover

\[ \text{Total asset turnover}=\frac{\text{Sales}}{\text{Total assets}} \]

  1. 盈利能力measures

\[ \text{Profit margin}=\frac{\text{Net income}}{\text{Sales}} \]

\[ ROA=\frac{\text{Net income}}{\text{Total assets}} \]

\[ ROE=\frac{\text{Net income}}{\text{Total equity}} \]

\[ EBITDA \text{ margin} = \frac{EBITDA}{\text{Sales}} \]

  1. 市值measure

\[ \text{Market capitalization}=\$\text{price}\times \#\text{share} \] \[ PE \text{ ratio}=\frac{\text{price/s}}{\text{earnings/s}} \]

\[ \text{mkt-to-book ratio}=\frac{\text{mkt value/s}}{\text{book value/s}} \]

\[ \text{Enterprise value (EV)}=\text{Market capitalization} + \text{Mkt value of interest bearing debt}-\text{Cash} \]

\[ \text{EV multiple} = \frac{\text{EV}}{\text{EBITDA}} \]

杜邦分析

\[ \text{ROE}=\frac{\text{Net income}}{\text{Total equity}}=\frac{\text{NI}}{\text{TA}}\times \frac{\text{TA}}{\text{TE}}=\text{ROA}\times\text{EM} \]

\[ \begin{aligned} \text{ROE}&=\frac{\text{NI}}{\text{Sales}}\times \frac{\text{Sales}}{\text{TA}}\times \frac{\text{TA}}{\text{TE}}\\ &=\text{Profit margin}\times \text{Total asset turnover}\times\text{Equity multiple} \end{aligned} \]

entry.title: 记Wiserclub录取
entry.content:
收到了录取邮件才放心来写，即便结束后就感觉十拿九稳。我第一志愿是机器学习，第二志愿Python。机组最多录取20人，候选人27个；Python最多录取26人，候选人41个。面试形式是多对多群面，但不是无领导小组讨论。第一志愿相同的五个候选人被分到同一场面试，第二志愿会有不同，但每个志愿的负责人都会来问问题。

机组这边问了三个问题

  1. 写出sigmoid函数（这个问题很多人不会，负责人就换了个问题，但我还是答了） \[ \sigma(x)=\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}} \]

  2. 写出线性回归的解析解（刚好前一天做机器学习作业的时候有用到，就复习了一下，运气好）

\[ \Theta = (X^TX)^{-1}X^TY \]

  1. 讲一个你熟悉的机器学习算法

我一开始说我就讲决策树，看学长有点不以为然，感觉确实有点简单，就说有一种决策树叫XGBoost。但XGBoost是GBDT的改进版，就不得不提到GBDT，最后就顺着讲了GBDT。虽然一开始思路有点乱，但讲的还不错，我讲清楚了迭代的思路，学长就说“ok好了好了”，接着他问了我个follow up question

  1. “这是Boosting还是Bagging？”

我思索片刻说Boosting（GBDT的全称就是Gradient boosting decision tree），学长给我竖大拇指，然后就再没问我问题了

印象里问其他人的问题还有“说几个激活函数”，其他就不记得

Python组的问题是：手写一段代码，提取字符串中的奇数位字符

我不记得判断字符串长度的代码是啥了，就随便写了个pd.str.length()，然后用个for循环，总之就瞎写（刚查了下正确写法是s.str.len()，s是字符串）

每次被认可都在增强我的自信。自从BEC那次被拒后一直在否定自己，感觉和金融学生比自己一无是处，但其实只是方向不同和阅历不够。从美国回来后感觉认知能力强了许多，也更能handle一些事情，放在以前是大事的，现在不痛不痒就过去了。BEC和XCC我都没申，因为不是我的菜，当然论能力我完全有资格进。这点在上学期我会否定，会想说“就算申了他们也不一定要”。但现在想，不要我 是他们的损失，他们的失误。而且一个学生社团搞这么elite风格，几百候选人只录取十几个，其实挺作的。社团的作用就是socialize，一类同好的聚会，现在人数上这样限制，其实是自毁根基，搞闭关锁国那套，没啥意思

有趣的是，有个化院的去年进了BEC，wiserclub一志愿python面试没过。不过他确实大佬啦，跨保了清华公共管理学的医院管理，复杂的背景，有趣

entry.title: ML面试速成
entry.content:
准备Wiserclub机器学习组的面试，绰绰有余

決策樹

分類

用Entropy或Gini index衡量不確定性（impurity）

  1. 信息增益適合分類多，每類少 \(\Rightarrow\) ID3

\[ \text{Entropy}=\sum_i-p_i\log(p_i) \]

\[ \max IG = E(parent)-\sum_i w_iE(child_i) \]

越大越好

  1. 信息增益比 \(\Rightarrow\) C4.5

有時候雖然split沒什麼用，因為他多分出好多小分支，purity雖然上去了，但如果每個值都不同然後你把每個值分成一類，不也沒什麼用

\[ II = -\sum_iw_i\log(w_i) \]

\[ GR = \frac{IG}{II} \]

越大越好

  1. Gini index適合分類少，每類數量多，優點是計算快 \(\Rightarrow\) CART

\[ Gini(D)=1-\sum_{i=1}^Cp_i^2 \]

越小越好

回歸

用Variance衡量不確定性

\[ \text{Var Reduction} = Var(parent)-\sum_i w_iVar(child_i) \]

隨機森林

決策樹對數據太敏感了

Bootstrap: 穩健，受原始數據集影響小

Feature selection: 減弱樹之間的關聯性（數量最好\(\sqrt n / \log n\)）

GBDT

Gradient Boosting Decision Tree

Boosting: \(A\Rightarrow B\Rightarrow C\Rightarrow \cdots\)

Bagging, Stacking

XGBoost

\[ F=L(\text{Loss function})+\overbrace{\Omega(\text{Regularizer正則項})}^{懲罰葉節點過多} \]

神經網路

卷積 CNN

  1. 卷積層：提取features
  2. 池化層：降維（max pooling，average pooling）
  3. 全連接層

Resnet(2015)引入殘差學習機制

循環 RNN

處理序列，短期记忆

問題：梯度消失

解決梯度消失的方法

用ReLU函數

\[ f(x)=\max (0,x) \]

Alexnet(2012)第一次用ReLU函數

缺點：死亡ReLU \(\Rightarrow\) 改進：Leaky ReLU，PReLU，Swish（谷歌弄的）

LSTM

解決梯度消失，引入門控單元（遺忘、輸入、輸出），GRU（Gated Recurrent Unit）則用重置和更新兩個門

有很多統計模型可以做出預測，但預測效果比較差強人意。而機器學習通常會犧牲可解釋性以獲得強大的預測能力。例如，從線性回歸到神經網絡，盡管解釋性變差，但是預測能力卻大幅提高。

圖 GNN

有圖就可以用GNN

Transformer

RNN \(\rightarrow\) Seq2Seq \(\xrightarrow{意義存儲有限}\) attention \(\xrightarrow{太慢了}\) self-attention

Seq2Seq: encoder \(\Rightarrow\) 意義 \(\Rightarrow\) decoder

self-attention: 提取每個詞的意義再拼起來

BERT

脫胎於Transformer的encoder，把詞語標示為向量

訓練好後，只需要根據任務進行微調，省事

GPT

脫胎於Transformer的decoder

zero shot learning 零樣本學習

每一步輸出都基於上一步輸出的內容，“生成”很厲害

生成對抗 GAN

生成、判別、對抗

互相打架升級

BP算法

back propagation

網絡生成的結果和真實值對比，低了就提高權重，高了就降低權重

很容易過擬合，解決辦法是分出一部分樣本作驗證集，如果訓練集的誤差在\(\downarrow\)，而驗證集的誤差在\(\uparrow\)，說明開始過擬合，及時停止訓練

分類算法

K-nearest neighbors

分類算法，物以類聚人以群分

選擇K很重要，畫個圈，算歐式距離或曼哈頓距離

支持向量機 SVM

classification margin，support vector

怎麼找中間那條線，就是盡量讓支持向量離margin的距離遠

有交叉：最小化距離

Deep learning出現前最好用的分類算法是隨機森林和SVM

K-means

聚類算法

不需要標籤信息，無監督學習

entry.title: BasicSetTheory
entry.content:
def. 定義，prop. 性質，con. 概念，ex. 例子

Sets

def. Let \(\Omega\) be a set, then \(\mathcal{P}(\Omega)\) is the collection of all subsets of \(\Omega\). \(\mathcal{P}\) is called power set.

ex.

\[ A=\{x, y, z\} \]

\[ \mathcal{P}(A) = \{ \{x\}, \{y\}, \{z\}, \{x, y\}, \{y, z\}, \{x, z\}, \{x, y, z\}, \{\} \} \]

den. Collection of subsets of A (not all subsets, probably) is denoted as \(\mathcal{A}\)

con. intersection over arbitrary index sets

\[ \begin{aligned} \left[0,10\right] &= [0,1]\cup [0,2]\cup \cdots\cup [0,10]\\ &=\bigcup_{n=1}^{10}[0,n]\\ &=\bigcup_{n\in \{1,2,\cdots,10\}}[0,n] \end{aligned} \]

\(\{1,2,\cdots,10\}\)就是一個 index set

prop.

\[ 1_A\leqslant 1_B\Leftrightarrow A\subset B \]

def.

\[ \liminf_{n\rightarrow\infty}A_n=\bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty}\bigcap_{k=n}^{\infty}A_k \]

理解角度一：換成邏輯語言

\[ \omega\in \bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty}\bigcap_{k=n}^{\infty}A_k \]

\[ \Rightarrow \exists n_0\ s.t.\ \omega\in \bigcap_{k=n_0}^{\infty}A_k \]

\[ \Rightarrow \omega\in A_k\ \forall k\geqslant n_0 \]

ex.

\[ \limsup_{n\rightarrow\infty}A_n=\bigcap_{n=1}^{\infty}\bigcup_{k=n}^{\infty}A_k \]

try: \(\omega \in \bigcap_{n=1}^{\infty}\bigcup_{k=n}^{\infty}A_k\Rightarrow \omega\in \bigcup_{k=n}^{\infty}A_k\ \forall n\Rightarrow \omega\in A_k\ \exists k\geqslant n\)

理解角度二：函數列收斂點

\[ 收斂：\forall \varepsilon>0\ \bigg [ \exists N\ \forall n>N \ |f_n(x)-f(x)|<\varepsilon \bigg ] \]

\[ \bigcup_{N=1}^{\infty}\bigcap_{n=N}^{\infty}\{x:|f_n(x)-f(x)|<\varepsilon \}=\liminf_{N\rightarrow\infty}C_N \]

\[ 發散：\exists \varepsilon_0>0\ \forall N \ \exists n_0>N \ s.t. \ |f_{n_0}(x)-f(x)|\geqslant \varepsilon_0 \]

\[ \bigcap_{N=1}^{\infty}\bigcup_{n=N}^{\infty}\{x:|f_{n_0}(x)-f(x)|\geqslant \varepsilon_0\}=\limsup_{N\rightarrow\infty}D_N \]

理解角度三：頻率角度

happens eventually

\[ \liminf_{n\rightarrow\infty}A_n=\{\omega:\omega\in A_k\ \forall k\geqslant n_0\} \]

happens infinitely often

\[ \limsup_{n\rightarrow\infty}A_n=\{\omega:\omega \in A_{k_n} \ \exists k_n\geqslant n\ \forall n\} \]

Algebra

def.

Let \(\mathcal{A}\) be collection of subsets of \(\Omega\), \(\mathcal{A}\) is closed under \(\big[\bigcup,\bigcap,(\cdot)^c,\limsup,\liminf\big]\) if the set obtained by performing [operation] on \(\mathcal{A}\) is still on \(\mathcal{A}\)

def.

An algebra/field \(\mathcal{A}\) is a non-empty class(=collection) of subsets of \(\Omega\), s.t.

  1. \(\Omega\in \mathcal{A}\)
  2. \(A\in\mathcal{A}\) implies \(A^c\in\mathcal{A}\)
  3. \(A,B\in \mathcal{A}\) implies \(A\cup B\in\mathcal{A}\) (expand to \(\bigcup_{k=1}^{n}A_k\in \mathcal{A}\))

2+3:

\[ (\bigcup_{k=1}^nA_k^c )^c=\bigcap_{k=1}^nA_k\in\mathcal{A} \]

def.

An algebra is called a \(\sigma\)-algebra if

\(\{A_n\}_{n=1}^{\infty}\subset \mathcal{A}\) implies \(\bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty}A_n\in \mathcal{A}\)

\[ 同時(\bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty}A_n^c)^c=\bigcap_{n=1}^{\infty}A_n \]

相當於把algebra的第三個條件延拓到countable上

正例. \(\mathcal{B}=\mathcal{P}(\Omega), \mathcal{B}=\{\varnothing,\Omega\}\)

類比有限維線性空間

def.

\(\mathcal{A}\) is a collection of subsets of \(\Omega\), \(\sigma(\mathcal{A})\) is a \(\sigma\)-algebra generated by \(\mathcal{A}\), satisfying

  1. \(\mathcal{A}\subset \sigma(\mathcal{A})\)
  2. \(\mathcal{B}\) is another \(\sigma\)-algebra containing \(\mathcal{A}\), we have \(\sigma(\mathcal{A})\subset \mathcal{B}\)

def.

Borel \(\sigma\)-algebra

\[ \mathcal{B}_{\mathbb{R}}=\sigma(\text{open subsets of } \mathbb{R}) \]

實變結論：任何 \(\mathbb{R}\) 上的 open set 都是 countable、disjoint 個開區間的 \(\bigcup\)

直觀的說，subsets \(\Rightarrow\) \(\bigcup_i (a_i,b_i)\)。實際上有

\[ H_1=\{(a,b):-\infty\leqslant a\leqslant b\leqslant \infty\} \]

\[ 則 \ \sigma(H_1)=\mathcal{B}_{\mathbb{R}} \]

Borel \(\sigma\)-algebra 中的集合叫 Borel sets

基本技巧：\(A=(A\backslash B)\bigcup (A\bigcap B)\)

entry.title: 留數例題
entry.content:
Contour integral（路徑積分）

例題1

計算 \[ \int_{-\pi}^{\pi}\frac{d\theta}{5+3\cos \theta} \]

微積分做法：let \(u=\tan \frac{\theta}{2}\cdots\)

留數做法

\[ z=e^{i\theta}=\cos\theta+i\sin\theta \]

\[ \bar{z}=e^{-i\theta}=\cos\theta-i\sin\theta \]

\(|z|=1\), \(\bar{z}=\frac{1}{z}\)

\[ \cos\theta=\frac{1}{2}(z+\bar{z})=\frac{1}{2}(z+\frac{1}{z}) \]

\[ \begin{aligned} \int_{-\pi}^{\pi}\frac{d\theta}{5+3\cos \theta}&=\int_C \frac{dz}{iz(5+\frac{3}{2}(z+\frac{1}{z}))}\\ &=\frac{1}{i}\int_C\frac{dz}{\frac{3}{2}z^2+5z+\frac{3}{2}}\\ &=\frac{2}{i}\int_C \frac{dz}{3z^2+10z+3}\\ &=\frac{2}{i}\int_C\frac{dz}{(3z+1)(z+3)}\\ &=4\pi \cdot \underbrace{\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_C\frac{dz}{(3z+1)(z+3)}}_{Res\left(\frac{1}{(3z+1)(z+3)};-\frac{1}{3}\right)} \end{aligned} \]

\(\frac{1}{(3z+1)(z+3)}\)有兩個simple pole，分別在\(z=-3,-\frac{1}{3}\)，因為單位圓半徑是1，\(z=-3\)在積分範圍外，只剩下\(-\frac{1}{3}\)

\[ Res=\lim_{z\rightarrow -\frac{1}{3}}(z+\frac{1}{3})\frac{1}{(3z+1)(z+3)}=\lim_{z\rightarrow -\frac{1}{3}}\frac{1}{3z+9}=\frac{1}{8} \]

\[ \therefore \int_{-\pi}^{\pi}\frac{d\theta}{5+3\cos \theta}=\frac{4\pi}{8}=\frac{\pi}{2} \]

例題2

計算 \[ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\frac{P(x)}{Q(x)}dx \]

條件：\(P,Q\) real-valued polynomials, s.t.

  1. \(Q(x)\neq 0, x\in \mathbb{R}\)
  2. \(\deg Q\geqslant 2+\deg P\)

例題2.1

\[ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\frac{dx}{1+x^4} \]

微積分方法：

\[ x^4+1=x^4+2x^2+1-2x^2=(x^2+1)^2-2x^2=(x^2+\sqrt{2}x+1)(x^2-\sqrt{2}x+1) \]

留數方法：

方法一

畫半圓

先算奇異點\(z^4+1=0\Rightarrow z^4=-1=e^{\pi i}\)

\[ z=e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i}, e^{\frac{3}{4}\pi i}, e^{\frac{5}{4}\pi i}, e^{\frac{7}{4}\pi i} \]

\[ \int_{\Gamma}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}=2\pi i Res\left(\frac{1}{1+z^4};e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i},e^{\frac{3}{4}\pi i}\right) \]

\[ Res\ at\ e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i} =\lim_{z\rightarrow e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i}}(z-e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i})\frac{1}{z^4+1} =\lim_{z\rightarrow e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i}}\frac{1}{\frac{z^4+1-0}{z-e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i}}} =\frac{1}{(z^4+1)'\vert_{z=e^{\frac{\pi}{4}i}}} =\frac{1}{4e^{\frac{3}{4}\pi i}} =\frac{1}{4}e^{-\frac{3}{4}\pi i} =\frac{1}{4}(\cos \frac{3}{4}\pi-i\sin \frac{3}{4}\pi) \]

\[ Res\ at\ e^{\frac{3\pi}{4}i} =\lim_{z\rightarrow e^{\frac{3\pi}{4}i}}(z-e^{\frac{3\pi}{4}i})\frac{1}{z^4+1} =\lim_{z\rightarrow e^{\frac{3\pi}{4}i}}\frac{1}{\frac{z^4+1-0}{z-e^{\frac{3\pi}{4}i}}} =\frac{1}{(z^4+1)'\vert_{z=e^{\frac{3\pi}{4}i}}} =\frac{1}{4e^{\frac{9}{4}\pi i}} =\frac{1}{4}e^{-\frac{9}{4}\pi i} =\frac{1}{4}e^{-\frac{\pi}{4} i} =\frac{1}{4}(\cos \frac{1}{4}\pi-i\sin \frac{1}{4}\pi) \]

\(e^{-\frac{9}{4}\pi i}=e^{-\frac{\pi}{4} i}\)是因為\(e^{2\pi i}=1\)，把兩個點的留數相加

\[ \therefore \int_{\Gamma}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}=2\pi i\times \frac{1}{4}(-2i\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\pi \]

\[ \int_{-R}^R\frac{dx}{1+x^4}+\int_{\Gamma_R}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\pi \]

下面證明\(R\rightarrow \infty\)時，第二項趨近於0

\[ \lim_{R\rightarrow\infty}\left|\int_{\Gamma_R}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}\right|\leqslant \lim_{R\rightarrow\infty}\int_0^{\pi}\frac{Rd\theta}{|1+z^4|}\leqslant \lim_{R\rightarrow\infty}\int_0^{\pi}\frac{2Rd\theta}{R^4}=\lim_{R\rightarrow\infty}\frac{2\pi }{R}=0 \]

where \(|1+z^4|\geqslant \frac{|z^4|}{2}=\frac{R^4}{2}\)

方法二

畫四分之一圓

\[ \int_{\Gamma}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}=2\pi i\cdot Res\left(\frac{1}{1+z^4};e^{\frac{1}{4}\pi i}\right)=2\pi i\cdot \frac{1}{4}e^{-\frac{3}{4}\pi i}=\frac{2\pi i}{4}(\cos \frac{3}{4}\pi-i\sin \frac{3}{4}\pi)=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}\pi (1-i) \]

\[ \int_{\Gamma}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}=\int_{\Gamma_1}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}+\int_{\Gamma_3}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}+\int_{\Gamma_R}\frac{dz}{1+z^4} \]

\[ \Downarrow \]

\[ \int_0^R\frac{dx}{1+x^4}+\int_R^0\frac{idy}{1+y^4}+\underbrace{\int_{\Gamma_R}\frac{dz}{1+z^4}}_{\xrightarrow{R\rightarrow \infty}0}=(1-i)\int_0^R\frac{dx}{1+x^4}\xrightarrow{R\rightarrow \infty}(1-i)\int_0^{\infty}\frac{dx}{1+x^4} \]

\[ \because (1-i)\int_0^{\infty}\frac{dx}{1+x^4}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}\pi (1-i) \]

\[ \therefore \int_0^{\infty}\frac{dx}{1+x^4}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}\pi \]

entry.title: 留數
entry.content:
Residue（留數）

Let \(z_0\) be a singularity of \(f\), let \(C\) be a simple closed curve (positively oriented), s.t. \(z_0\) is surrounded by \(C\) and \(f\) is holomorphic on \(U\verb|\|\{z_0\}\) and \(C\subset U\verb|\|\{z_0\}\)

Theo (residue)

\(C\) surrounds \(z_1,\cdots,z_k\), Then

\[ \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_Cf(z)dz=\sum_{j=1}^k\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{C_j}f(z)dz \]

\(z_0\): pole, 則

\[ f(z)=\frac{C_{-m}}{(z-z_0)^m}+\cdots+\frac{C_{-1}}{z-z_0}+h(z) \]

\[ \begin{aligned} residue&=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{C_{\varepsilon}}f(z)dz\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{C_{\varepsilon}}\left(\frac{C_{-m}}{(z-z_0)^m}+\cdots +\frac{C_{-1}}{z-z_0}\right)dz\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_0^{2\pi} \left(\frac{C_{-m}}{(\varepsilon e^{i\theta})^m}+\cdots +\frac{C_{-1}}{\varepsilon e^{i\theta}}\right)i\varepsilon e^{i\theta}d\theta\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi }\int_0^{2\pi }\left(\frac{C_{-m}}{(\varepsilon e^{i\theta})^{m-1}}+\cdots +\frac{C_{-2}}{\varepsilon e^{i\theta}}+C_{-1}\right)d\theta \end{aligned} \]

  1. 如果是single pole, i.e. \(\displaystyle f(z)=\frac{C_{-1}}{z-z_0}+h(z)\)

\[ z_0留數=\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}(z-z_0)f(z) \]

因為

\[ (z-z_0)f(z)=C_{-1}+(z-z_0)h(z)\rightarrow C_{-1} \]

  1. 如果是order of the pole m>1

\[ z_0留數=\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}\frac{1}{(m-1)!}\frac{d^{m-1}}{dz^{m-1}}[(z-z_0)^mf(z)] \]

因為

\[ f(z)=\frac{C_{-m}}{(z-z_0)^m}+\cdots+\frac{C_{-1}}{z-z_0}+h(z) \]

\[ (z-z_0)^mf(z)=C_{-m}+C_{-m+1}(z-z_0)+\cdots +C_{-1}(z-z_0)^{m-1}+(z-z_0)^mh(z) \]

\(\infty\)上的留數

如果在\(\infty\)處解析，則留數為0。若是singularity，則

  1. removable: \(Res=0\)
  2. pole: \(Res=C_{-1}\)
  3. essential: \(Res=C_{-1}\)

判斷\(\infty\)是哪類奇異點

\[ f \text{ at } \infty\Leftrightarrow f(\frac{1}{z})\text{ at }0 \]

\[ \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{|z|=R,\circlearrowright}f(z)dz\overset{w=\frac{1}{z}}{=\!=\!=}\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{|w|=\frac{1}{R},\circlearrowleft}f(\frac{1}{w})(-\frac{1}{w^2}dw) \]

where \(z=\frac{1}{w}\), \(dz=-\frac{1}{w^2}dw\)

因此

\[ Res[f(z),\infty]=Res[-\frac{1}{w^2}f(\frac{1}{w}),0] \]

這裡\(R\)非常大，取倒數後\(\frac{1}{R}\)非常小，把原本的無窮遠點拉回到0

denote \(z=Re^{i\theta}\), then

\[ w=\frac{1}{Re^{i\theta}}=\frac{1}{R}e^{-i\theta}=\frac{1}{R}e^{i(-\theta)} \]

所以無窮遠時是逆時針，取倒數後變順時針

e.g.

\[ f(z)=z\Leftrightarrow f(\frac{1}{z})=\frac{1}{z} \]

左邊residue at \(\infty\)

\[ \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\circlearrowright}zdz=0 \]

右邊變成\(-\frac{1}{w^2}f(\frac{1}{w})=(-\frac{1}{z^2})\frac{1}{z}=-\frac{1}{z^3}\), residue at 0

\[ \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\circlearrowleft}-\frac{1}{z^3}dz=0 \]

\(\mathbb{C}_{\infty}\)上的留數

\(\mathbb{C}_{\infty}\)上只有有限個isolated singularity，把它們的留數全部加起來一定等於0

若\(\infty\)是奇異點，如左圖，抵銷

若\(\infty\)是解析的，想像成Riemann sphere（右圖）。在一個解析的地方在封閉的曲線上積分，所以由柯西定理，等於0

回到這個問題上來。首先，沒有人知道未來是什麼樣，都在猜，這個問題沒有意義。再來，聽別人的安排走完一生豈不是很沒意思。高考完聽別人說這個專業怎樣那個怎樣，到處打聽，然後上大學，一待就是四年。出來接著讀研，可能看看知乎回答，選一些“不會被取代”的方向。人們把自己困在信息茧房裡，一直接收別人的觀點，釘死一個方向努力，其實就是巨嬰式思維，不會時不時停下來看看四周，思考自己在哪。這就好比旅遊，有的人只是直達某個打卡點，就走了；有的人隨機漫步，會見到更多有趣的事。人生不就是場旅行，如果走成折線該多沒意思，充滿不確定性，何嘗不是種刺激？

entry.title: 談談我對王者榮耀的理解
entry.content:
王者榮耀玩到今天，也算是有些成熟的理解了。然而，不說它商業模式怎樣，騰訊多會賺錢，但從玩家角度，大部分人就沒理解。

首先，這不是一款團隊遊戲。雖然是5v5moba，實際上是1v9。沒錯，這是個人賽，隊友都是你的對手。從經濟學的角度，資源是有限的。推廣到任何場合都是這樣：在學校裡老師只有那麼些，老師不照顧你就照顧他；職場上晉升名額就這麼些，你不上位就是他上位。王者裡也是一樣，你不拿人頭就是隊友拿，你不死隊友就死，這種情況經常出現。

但是隊友比名義上的對手更可惡：你殺不死他們。想讓他們死往往費盡周折，要麼剛開完團立馬往回跑，要麼關鍵時候不開技能把他們賣了，但畢竟是借刀殺人，不容易也不爽快。再有一點，眾所周知國人的素質之差令人髮指，素質差的往往是底部工薪階層，這些人沒錢出去玩，所以通常的娛樂項目就是宅在家裡看劇玩手機。他們有時也會花大筆錢買英雄買皮膚，但這點錢可能普通人出去玩一天就花完了還不夠，這是後話。我身邊的朋友都開始卸載王者，基本上沒什麼人玩了，因此能推斷大部分玩王者的人都素質差。從博弈論的角度來說，匹配到的人大概率只遇見一次，是單次博弈，那我一定要最大化自己的utility，管別人死活。

那我們先定義下玩王者的utility function，即\(u(x)\)。為了簡化，假設\(u'(x)>0\)，那麼\(x\)是什麼？我分析了下自己的體驗，有一下幾個指標

  • \(z_1:\) 個人擊殺（殺人）
  • \(z_2:\) 個人死亡（保命）
  • \(z_3:\) 個人輔助（混數據）
  • \(z_4:\) 隊友\(k\)擊殺 \((k=1,2,3,4)\)（噁心隊友）

\[ u(x)=u(x_1,\cdots,x_4) \]

其中\(x_i=x_i(z_i)\quad i=1,\cdots,5\)

大致設計了下函數，表達式和圖像如下

\[ \begin{aligned} &x_1=\log(x+1)\\ &x_2=1-e^{z_2}\\ &x_3=\log_2(x+2.5)-1.3\\ &x_4=\begin{cases} 1 & z_1\geqslant \bar{z}_k\\ 0 & z_1< \bar{z}_k \end{cases} \end{aligned} \]

自己給五個指標的重要性打分

\(z_1\) \(z_2\) \(z_3\) \(z_4\) \(w^a\) \(w^g\) \(w^e\) \(w^c\)
\(z_1\) 1 1/4 5 1/3 0.1603 0.1489 0.1553 0.1548
\(z_2\) 4 1 6 4 0.4965 0.5071 0.4976 0.5004
\(z_3\) 1/5 1/6 1 1/4 0.0571 0.0539 0.0548 0.0553
\(z_4\) 3 1/4 4 1 3 0.2861 0.2901 0.2923

\(CR=0.073<0.1\) 通過一致性檢驗

\(w^a, w^g, w^e\)分別表示用算數平均，幾何平均，特徵值法算權重的結果，\(w^c\)為三者綜合。四捨五入，權重為

\[ w=[0.15,0.5,0.06,0.29] \]

保命比較重要，莊周最合適，因為場上最怕被控，一旦被控就可能被秒。莊周被動和大招都是解控，保命能力一流。為了照顧同樣比較重要的“噁心隊友”，我必須多k頭或把對面放跑。如果對面被殺了，必須是我殺的，否則寧願讓對面逃掉，所以帶斬殺。

我對王者最本質的理解就是：它是款遊戲。不管再怎麼刺激，僅僅是個遊戲，手機一關，跟現實生活一點關聯也沒有。再問一句，為什麼玩遊戲？就是放鬆、開心呀。如果為了贏而贏，為了上分把自己弄的精疲力盡、氣急敗壞，何必玩呢？所以輸贏無所謂，自己開心最重要。即便隊伍輸了，我也可以贏了。而且這個遊戲上我見太多白痴，就龐大的基數和小樣本抽樣可以近似估計和我一起玩的都是白痴。那就不用客氣了，反正我不噁心他們就會被他們噁心，這也是個博弈。

\[ \Rightarrow f'(z_0)=\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}\frac{f(z)-f(z_0)}{z-z_0}=u_1-iu_2\overset{also}{=}v_2+iv_1 \]

\([ICA-2.4]\)

\[ \begin{aligned} &\frac{\partial f}{\partial r}=U_r+iV_r\\ &\frac{\partial f}{\partial r}=\frac{\partial f}{\partial z}\cdot \frac{\partial z}{\partial r}=f'(z)\cdot e^{i\theta} \end{aligned} \]

\[ \begin{aligned} &\frac{\partial f}{\partial \theta}=U_{\theta}+iV_{\theta}\\ &\frac{\partial f}{\partial \theta}=\frac{\partial f}{\partial z}\cdot \frac{\partial z}{\partial \theta}=f'(z)\cdot ire^{i\theta} \end{aligned} \]

\[ \Rightarrow U_r+iV_r=\frac{1}{ir}(U_{\theta}+iV_{\theta}) \]

整理後，記得\(\Re=\Re,\Im=\Im\)

\([ICA-2.5]\)

note: \(z=(x,y)\in \bar{D}\), therefore \((x,-y)\in D\) satisfies Cauchy-Riemann as given

\([ICA-2.6]\)

note: replace \(r\rightarrow R^2/r\)

\[ U_1(\frac{R^2}{r},\theta)=\frac{r}{R^2}V_2(\frac{R^2}{r},\theta) \]

\([ICA-2.8,2.9]\)

\([ICA-3.9]\) Prove: for \(\displaystyle \sum_{k=0}^{\infty}a_k(z-z_0)^k\), the formula of radius of convergence \(R\) is

\[ \frac{1}{R}=\limsup_{n\rightarrow \infty}|a_n|^{\frac{1}{n}} \]

pf. 思路：湊\(|a_nz^n|\)，跟1比較

  1. \(0<R<\infty\)

By \(\displaystyle \frac{1}{R}=\limsup_{n\rightarrow \infty}|a_n|^{\frac{1}{n}}\)

For all \(n\) large enough

\[ |a_n|^{\frac{1}{n}}<\frac{1}{R}+\varepsilon =\frac{1}{R-\varepsilon} \]

\[ |a_n|<\frac{1}{(R-\varepsilon)^n} \]

For \(z<R\), therefore \(z<R-\varepsilon\)

\[ |a_nz^n|<(\frac{z}{R-\varepsilon})^n<1 \ \square \]

For infinite \(n\)

\[ |a_n|^{\frac{1}{n}}>\frac{1}{R}-\varepsilon=\frac{1}{R+\varepsilon} \]

\[ |a_n|>\frac{1}{R+\varepsilon}^n \]

For \(|z|>R\), also \(|z|>R+\varepsilon\)

\[ |a_nz^n|>(\frac{z}{R+\varepsilon})^n>1 \ \square \]

  1. \(R=0\)

\(\Rightarrow \frac{1}{R}=\infty\)

\[ |a_n|^{\frac{1}{n}}>K,\ \forall K \]

choose

\[ |z|>\frac{1}{K} \]

In order to let

\[ |a_nz^n|>(Kz)^n>1 \ \square \]

  1. \(R=\infty\)

\(\Rightarrow \frac{1}{R}=0\)

\[ \therefore |a_n|^{\frac{1}{n}}<\varepsilon \Rightarrow |a_n|<\varepsilon^n \]

choose

\[ z<\frac{1}{\varepsilon} \]

Inorder to let

\[ |a_nz^n|<(z\varepsilon)^n<1 \ \square \]

\([ICA-3.10(c)]\) Find convergence \(R\) for

\[ 1+3z+2z^2+9z^3+\cdots+2^nz^{2n}+3^{n+1}z^{2n+1}+\cdots \]

the formula for \(1/R\) yields \(R = 3^{-1/2}\) (the terms of even index don't have any influence), why?

\([ICA-3.11]\) Let \(\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}a_kz^k\) have radius of convergence \(R\) and let \(m\) be a positive integer. Show that series

\[ \sum_{k=0}^{\infty}k^ma_kz^k \]

and

\[ \sum_{k=0}^{\infty}k(k-1)\cdots(k-m) a_kz^k \]

both have radius of convergence \(R\)

Note: (2)不能用comparison test，因為是要求R，而不是判斷是否收斂，條件更嚴格。從(2)也能得到結論：對一個power series無論求導多少次，也有相同的radius of convergence

entry.title: 奇異點
entry.content:
Singular point 奇異點

  1. \(\exists M>0, |f(z)|\leqslant M, \forall z\in D/\{z_0\}\) （removeable singularity）
  2. \(\displaystyle \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}|f(z)|=+\infty\) （pole 極點）
  3. \(f\) is not bounded on \(D/\{z_0\}\) and \(\displaystyle \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}|f(z)|\neq +\infty\) （esential singularity 本質奇異點）最複雜

Theo (Mean value theorem)

\(D\subset \mathbb{C}\) domain, \(f\in O(D)\), let \(p\in D\), then provided that \(\bar{B}(p;r)\subset D\), we have

\[ f(p)=\frac{1}{2\pi}\int_0^{2\pi}f(p+re^{i\theta})d\theta \]

pf.

write \(w=p+re^{i\theta}\)

\[ \begin{aligned} f(p)&=\frac{1}{2\pi i} \int_{C_r}\frac{f(w)}{w-p}dw\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_0^{2\pi}\frac{f(p+re^{i\theta})}{re^{i\theta}}ire^{i\theta}d\theta\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi}\int_0^{2\pi}f(p+re^{i\theta})d\theta \end{aligned} \]

Theo (Maximum modulus principle)

\(D\subset \mathbb{C}\) domain, \(f\in O(D)\), Then \(|f|\) cannot attain local maximum in \(D\), unless \(f\) is a constant

pf. 如果modulus取到了local maxim，要證明是常數

\(z_0\in D\), i.e. \(\exists R>0, s.t.\ B(z_0;R)\subset D\) and \[ |f(z_0)|\geqslant |f(z)| \quad \forall z_0\in B(z_0;R) \]

let \(0<r<R\)

\[ \begin{aligned} |f(z_0)|=|\frac{1}{2\pi}\int_0^{2\pi}f(p+re^{i\theta})d\theta|&\leqslant \frac{1}{2\pi}\int_0^{2\pi}|f(p+re^{i\theta})|d\theta \\ &\leqslant \frac{1}{2\pi}\int_0^{2\pi}|f(z_0)|d\theta=|f(z_0)| \end{aligned} \]

因為\(|f(z_0)|=|f(z_0)|\)，不等號全部變成等號，於是強迫

\[ |f(z_0+re^{i\theta})|=|f(z_0)| \quad \forall \theta, \ 0<r<R \]

\[ |f(z)|=const\quad z\in B(z_0;R) \]

\[ \therefore |f(z)|^2=const \]

\[ \therefore \frac{\partial^2}{\partial z\partial \bar{z}}|f(z)|^2=\frac{\partial^2}{\partial z\partial \bar{z}}(f(z)\bar{f}(z))\overset{?}{=}|\frac{\partial f}{\partial z}|^2=0 \]

\(?\) 處，

\[ \therefore f'(z)=0\quad on \ B(z_0;R) \]

\[ f(z)=const\quad on \ B(z_0;R) \]

\[ \therefore f(z)=const\quad on \ D \ (唯一集) \]

Theo

Let \(D\subset\mathbb{C}\) be a bounded domain and \(f\in O(D)\cap C(\bar{D})\) (連續到邊界)

If f is not a constant, then the max of \(|f|\) on \(\bar{D}\) must occur at some boundary point

最大值不可能在裡面，否則就由最大模定理變成常數函數。

Extended complex plane

對\(\mathbb{C}\)進行one point compactification（一點緊緻化）

\(\mathbb{C}_{\infty}=\mathbb{C}\cup \{\infty\}\)

先給它一個拓撲

open sets:

  1. contains all of the open sets of \(\mathbb{C}\)
  2. 加一個open set \(U\) s.t. \(\infty\in U\) and \(\mathbb{C}\verb|\| U\) is a compact subset of \(\mathbb{C}\)

\(\mathbb{C}_{\infty}:\) compact complex manifold（複流型），是一維的

其實就是\(\mathbb{CP}^1\)，Complex dim=1 complex projective space（一維的複投影空間）

Riemann sphere \(S^2\)

steoreographic projection 立體投影

\[ 解析同構：\mathbb{C}_{\infty}\simeq \mathbb{CP}^1\simeq S^2 \]

處理奇異點

第一類

removable singularity可以重新定義，讓它變成解析函數

Riemann's theorem on removable singularity

\(D\subset \mathbb{C}\), domain, \(z_0\in D\), \(f\in O(D)\verb|\|\{z_0\}\) and \(|f|\) is bounded on \(D\verb|\|\{z_0\}\)

Then \(f\) can be redefined at \(z_0\) s.t, the function still denoted by \(f\) is holoporphic in \(D\) i.e. \(f\in O(D)\)

pf. Consider

\[ g(z)=(z-z_0)^2f(z)\quad z\in D\verb|\| \{z_0\}\quad \star \]

\[ g(z_0)=0\quad \therefore g\in C(D) \]

\[ \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0} =\frac{g(z)-g(z_0)}{z-z_0} =\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}\frac{(z-z_0)^2f(z)}{z-z_0} =\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}(z-z_0)f(z)=0 \]

\(g\)每個點都可以微分

\[ \therefore g\in O(D) \]

\[ \therefore g(z) =\sum_{k=2}^{\infty}a_k(z-z_0)^k =(z-z_0)^2\cdot \sum_{m=0}^{\infty} a_{m+2}(z-z_0)^m=(z-z_0)^2\varphi (z)\quad \star \]

還是解析函數

\(\varphi\in O(D)\)

兩個星號，\(f(z)=\varphi(z)\)

\[ \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}f(z)=\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}\varphi(z)=\varphi(z_0) \]

If we redefine f at \(z_0\) to be \(\varphi(z_0)\), then \(f=\varphi\in O(D)\)

再證明 Liouville

Bounded entire function must be constant

除了北極之外有一個有界的解析函數，北極是第一類奇異點（因為周圍都有界），用Riemann的方法處理完

一個連續函數在緊緻的集合上一定有極大值，相對於附近的open set是內點，所以\(|f|\)在一個內點取到極大值。可是由最大模定理，強迫\(f\)在neighborhood上變成常數，再由恆等定理，它在\(\mathbb{C}\)上就是常數函數。

第二類

\(|f(z)|\rightarrow \infty\) as \(z\rightarrow z_0\)

i.e. \(\forall M>0, \ |f(z)|\geqslant M>0,\ when \ z\in B(z_0;\varepsilon)\verb|\| \{z_0\}\)

Consider

\[ g(z)=\frac{1}{f(z)}\quad \therefore g(z)\leqslant \frac{1}{M} \]

表示\(g(z)\)在disk上有界，\(\{z_0\}\)變成\(g(z)\)的第一類奇異點

\[ \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}g(z)=0 \]

由Riemann把\(g(z_0)\)定義為0，變成解析函數

\[ \therefore g(z)=\sum_{k=k_0}^{\infty}a_k(z-z_0)^k =(z-z_0)^{k_0}\cdot \underbrace{\sum_{m=0}^{\infty}a_{k_0+m}(z-z_0)^m}_{\varphi(z)} \]

\(k_0:\) smallest index s.t. \(a_{k_0}\neq 0\)；由定義的，\(常數項=0\)

\(\varphi\in O(B(z_0;\delta))\)，\(\varphi(z_0)=a_{k_0}\neq 0\)

\[ g(z)=\frac{1}{f(z)}=(z-z_0)^{k_0}\varphi(z)\quad \varphi(z_0)\neq 0 \]

On \(z\in B(z_0;\delta)\verb|\|\{z_0\}\)

\[ \begin{aligned} f(z)&=\frac{1}{(z-z_0)^{k_0}\varphi(z)}=\frac{1}{(z-z_0)^k}h(z)\\ &=\frac{1}{(z-z_0)^k}\underbrace{\left(c_0+c_1(z-z_0)+c_2(z-z_0)^2+\cdots \right)}_{h(z)} \end{aligned} \]

\[ \begin{aligned} \therefore f(z)=&\overbrace{\frac{c_0}{(z-z_0)^{k_0}}+\frac{c_1}{(z-z_0)^{k_0-1}}+\cdots+\frac{c_{k_0-1}}{z-z_0}}^{I_{z_0}}\\ &\qquad +\underbrace{c_{k_0}+c_{k_0+1}(z-z_0)+\cdots+c_{k_0+m}(z-z_0)^m+\cdots}_{h_{z_0}} \end{aligned} \]

\[ f(z)=I_{z_0}+h_{z_0} \]

\(I_{z_0}:\) singular part

\(h_{z_0}:\) holomorphic part

\(k_0\) is called the order of the pole, \(k_0=1\) we call it simple pole

亞純函數：A function is called a meromorphic function if \(f\) is holomorphic except for poles.

第三類

Essential singular point 本質奇異點

e.g. \(f(z)=e^z\) misses \(0\) only e.g. \(f(z)=z\) doesn't miss

Theo (Casorati-Weierstrass)

Let \(z_0\) be an essential singularity of \(f\). Let \(U\) be an open neighborhood of \(z_0\), s.t. \(f\in O(U\verb|\|\{z_0\})\)

Then \(f(U\verb|\|\{z_0\})\) is dense in \(\mathbb{C}\).

pf.

If not. i.e. \(\overline{f(U\verb|\|\{z_0\})}\neq \mathbb{C}\)

\(\mathbb{C}\verb|\|f(U\verb|\|\{z_0\})\) contains \(B(p;\delta), \delta>0\)

Consider

\[ g(z)=\frac{1}{f(z)-p}\quad z\in U\verb|\|\{z_0\} \]

\[ |g(z)|=\frac{1}{|f(z)-p|}\leqslant \frac{1}{\delta} \]

\(\therefore z_0\) is a removable singularity of \(g\)

\[ \therefore \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}g(z)=L \quad \exists L \]

  1. \(L=0\)

\[ \therefore \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}|f(z)|=\infty \Rightarrow z_0\text{ is a pole} \]

  1. \(L\neq 0\)

\[ \frac{1}{\displaystyle\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}f(z)-p}=L\neq 0\Rightarrow \lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}=p+\frac{1}{L}\quad \text{removable} \]

矛盾. \(\blacksquare\)

Picard's great thoerem

Same hypothesis as Casorati-Weierstrass

Then \(f(U\verb|\|\{z_0\})\) misses at most one point

e.g. \(f(z)=e^{1/z}\) misses only 0

Picard's little theorem

Let \(f\in O(\mathbb{C})\). If \(f(\mathbb{C})\) misses two points then \(f\) is a constant function

回想Liouville，說有界的entire function是常數函數。皮卡小定理則證明出只要整函數miss兩個點就變成常數函數，厲害很多

entry.title: Morera定理
entry.content:
柯西定理的逆敘述

Theo (Morera)

\(D\subset \mathbb{C}\) simply-connected domain. Let \(f\in C(D)\), if \(\int_{\partial \triangle}f(z)dz=0\), for any triangle \(\triangle\) in \(D\), then \(f\in O(D)\) \(\blacklozenge\)

\[ 連續 + \int_{\partial \triangle}f(z)dz=0 \Rightarrow 解析函數 \]

\(\triangle\): 對應simple closed curve

pf.

Define \[ F(z)=\int_{\Gamma} f(z)dz \]

well-defined: \(\Gamma-\Gamma_1=0 \Rightarrow \Gamma=\Gamma_1\)（轉一圈為0）

\[ F'(z)=f(z), \therefore F\in O(D) \]

解析函數在每個點附近都能展開成冪級數，就能微分無窮多次

\[ \therefore f\in O(D) \ \blacksquare. \]

例題 \(D\subset \mathbb{C}\), \(I\subset D\) (closed interval). \(f\in C(D)\)

Assume \(f\in O(D/I)\), 挖掉I後D還是開集

Is \(f\in O(D)\)?

手上只有Morera

Theo (Schwarz reflection principle)

Let \(D\subset \Pi_+\) (open upper half space), s.t. \(\partial D\cap \{x-axis\}=I\) closed interval.

Let \(D^*=\{\bar{z}|z\in D\}\)

let \(\Omega=D\cup \mathring{I}\cup D^*\), \(\mathring{I}\) 是 I 的interior

If \(f\in O(D)\cap C(D\cup \mathring{I})\), and \(f|_{\mathring{I}}\) is real

set \(g=\Omega\rightarrow \mathbb{C}\)

\[ g(z)=\begin{cases} f(z) &z\in D\\ f(z) &z\in \mathring{I}\\ \bar{f}(\bar{z})& z\in D^* \end{cases} \]

Then \(g\in O(\Omega)\). \(\blacklozenge\)

  1. 考慮連續性

\(D,D^*\)上都連續，在\(I\)上

\[ f(z)=u(z)+iv(z)\quad z\rightarrow x \Rightarrow f(x)=u(x) \]

\[ f(w)=u(\bar{w})-iv(\bar{w})\quad w\rightarrow x, \bar{w}\rightarrow x \Rightarrow f(x)=u(x) \]

entry.title: 解析函數的零點
entry.content:
實函數的零点存在聚點（limit point）

Theo Let \(D\) be a domain in \(\mathbb{C}\).

\(f\in O(D)\), let \(Z_f=\{z\in D|f(z)=0\}\)

If \(Z_f\) has a limit point in \(D\), then \(f\equiv 0\) on \(D\) \(\blacklozenge\)

只要不恆等於0，就必須全部零點都是孤點

只要零點中存在聚點，則\(f\)恆等於0

pf. Set \(A=\{w\in D|w \text{ is a limit point of }Z_f\}\)

By assumption, \(A\neq \varnothing\). 要證明\(A=D\)：既然domain即\(D\)上全是零點的聚點，那\(D\)上當然也全是零點

The only two subsets of a connected open set that are both closed and open is \(\varnothing\) and the set itself. 參考：intro_analysis_ch1

\(A\) is closed. (obvious)

let \(p\in A\subset D\), \(f(p)=0\)

要證\(p\)是\(A\)的內點，則證得\(A\)是open的

write

\[ f(z)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}a_k(z-p)^k=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}a_k(z-p)^k \]

因為\(0^0=1\)，所以\(f(p)=a_0+\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}a_k\cdot 0^k=a_0=0\)，自然想到是不是\(k\neq 0\)的係數也為0

Claim: \(a_k=0,\forall k\in \mathbb{N}\)

If not, then \(\exists a_{k_0}\neq 0\)，其中\(k_0:\) 最小的index

\[ \begin{aligned} \therefore f(z)&=a_{k_0}(z-p)^{k_0}+a_{k_0+1}(z-p)^{k_0+1}+\cdots\\ &=(z-p)^{k_0}(a_{k_0}+a_{k_0+1}(z-p)+\cdots) \end{aligned} \]

Set \(g(z)=a_{k_0}+a_{k_0+1}(z-p)+\cdots\), then \[ g(p)=a_{k_0}\neq 0 \]

在\(p\)点周圍\(f\)均不等於0，只有\(f(p)=0\)，所以\(p\)是孤點，不在\(A\)内，矛盾. \(\square\)

\(\therefore\) \(A\) is open \(\Rightarrow A=D\) \(\blacksquare\)

Def. Let \(D\) be a domain in \(\mathbb{C}\), \(E\subset D\), we say \(E\) is a set of uniqueness if, for \(f\in O(D)\), \([f(z)=0, z\in E]\) implies \([f(z)\equiv 0, \forall z\in D]\)

\[ \forall z\in E\xrightarrow{f(z)=0}E\xrightarrow{\forall z\in D}f(z)\equiv 0 \]

Any point sequence with an accumulation point in \(D\) is a set of uniqueness 聚點必須在domain裡，不能往邊界上走

Any open subset of \(D\) is a set of uniqueness

Theo (identity theorem) 恆等定理

Let \(f,g\in O(D)\), If \(f=g\) on open subset of \(D\), then \(f\equiv g\) on \(D\)

pf. 考慮\(h=f-g\)即可，\(h\)也是解析函數

反問題

Theo (Weierstrass)

Let \(D\) be a domain in \(\mathbb{C}\), let \(\{z_k\}\) be a sequence with no limit point in \(D\), for each \(k\) associate \(z_k\) with a positive integer \(m(k)\)

Then there exists a \(f\in O(D)\) such that the zeros of \(f\) are exactly \(z_k\)'s with multiplicity \(m(k)\) at \(z_k\) \(\blacklozenge\)

證明太複雜，不涉及

\(f\)不唯一，sequence沒有聚點不是set of uniqueness

由上面的定理：有一個domain，都能找到一個解析函數，不能從domain中延拓出去

Theo Let D be a domain in C, then there exists a \(f\in O(D)\), such that \(f\) cannot be holomorphically extended across any boundary point. （但這個定理在多複變是錯的）\(\blacklozenge\)

pf. 思路：找任意的\(f\in O(D)\)假設它們都可以延拓，推出矛盾

choose a seq of points \(\{z_k\}\) with no limit in \(D\), such that every boundary point is a limit point of this sequence

照這樣分下去到\(1-\frac 1k\)，最後無數的點會全堆在邊界

由Weierstrass

\[ \exists f\in O(D), \ s.t.\\ Z_f=\{z_k\}_{k=1}^{\infty},\quad m(k)=1 \]

如果能延拓出去，會發現矛盾

\[ g\in O(D),\quad f\in O(D) \]

\(g=f\) on \(D\cap U\)

因為\(f(z_k)=0\)，所以在這些點上\(g(z_k)=0\)

\[ \therefore g(p)=0\quad p\text{\ in an interior point} \]

注意到 \(p\) 是 \(U\) 的內點（不是\(D\)的內點），歐式空間中內點一定是聚點

內點：\(\exists \delta_0>0, s.t.\ U(p,\delta_0)\subset U\)，

聚點：\(\forall \delta>0, \exists s\in \mathring{U}(p,\delta),且 s\in U\)

考慮\(\forall \delta\).

  1. \(\delta<\delta_0\): \(\mathring{U}(p,\delta)\subset U(p,\delta)\subset U(p,\delta_0)\subset U\)，所以\(p\)的去心鄰域內有屬於\(U\)的點
  2. \(\delta >\delta_0\): 顯然\(\mathring{U}(p,\delta)\)內存在點屬於\(U\)

所以：內點一定是聚點，聚點不一定是內點（聚點也可以是邊界點）

這個條件會強迫

\(\Rightarrow g\equiv 0\) on \(U\) （set of uniqueness）

\(\Rightarrow f\equiv 0\) on \(U\cap D\)

因為 \(0\) 本身也是解析函數，所以現在 \(D\) 上有兩個解析函數：\(f\)和\(0\)

\(U\cap D\) 是 \(D\) 的open subset，由恆等定理，

\(f\equiv 0\) on \(D\)

可是原來的\(f\in O(D)\)是任意的，不恆等於0，矛盾. \(\blacksquare\)

多複變中，這種domain叫domain of holomorphy

entry.title: 解析函數的冪級數展開
entry.content:
Power series

Theo Let \(D\) be a domain in \(\mathbb{C}\). If \(f\in O(D)\), then \(f\in C^{\omega}(D)\)

\(C^{\omega}(D)\) means locally function can be represented by a power series \(\blacklozenge\)

\(\Gamma=\partial B(z_0;R)\)

\(f\in O(D)\) \[ \therefore \exists R>0, s.t. \bar{B}(z_0;R)\subset D \]

If \(z\in B(z_0;R)\), \(w\in \Gamma\). Then \[ \begin{aligned} f(z)&=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{w-z_0-(z-z_0)}dw \end{aligned} \]

If \(\exists r>0\)， \(s.t. \ |z-z_0|\leq r<R\). Then

\[ \begin{aligned} &=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{1}{w-z_0}\frac{f(w)}{1-\frac{z-z_0}{w-z_0}}dw\\ &=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{1}{w-z_0}\left(\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\left(\frac{z-z_0}{w-z_0} \right)^k \right)f(w)dw\quad \ast\\ &=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\left(\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z_0)^{k+1}}dw \right)(z-z_0)^k\quad \ast\ast\\ &=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}a_k(z-z_0)^k \end{aligned} \]

i.e. \(\displaystyle a_k=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z_0)^{k+1}}dw\)

From \(\ast\) to \(\ast\ast\)，use Math Analysi (II)

\[ f(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw \]

\[ f'(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z)^2}dw \]

\[ f''(z)=\frac{2}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z)^3}dw \] \[ \vdots \]

\[ f^{(k)}(z)=\frac{k!}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z)^{k+1}}dw \]

\[ \therefore a_k=\frac{f^{(k)}(z_0)}{k!} \]

\[ \Rightarrow f(z)=\frac{f^{(k)}(z_0)}{k!}(z-z_0)^k \]

解析延拓

\(a_k\)的值跟\(R\)沒關系，圓盤可以任意大小。有可能出現展開後超出domain：解析延拓（holomorphic continuation）

Ex.

\[ f(z)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}z^k \Rightarrow \frac{1}{1-z} \]

\(z<1\)時收斂，\(z\geq 1\)時發散

在\(z=-\frac 12\)展开， \[ f(z)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}b_k(z+\frac{1}{2})^k \]

在\(|z+\frac 12|<\frac 32\)上統統收斂

Cauchy Estimate

Theo Cauchy's estimate

let \(M=\max_{|z-z_0|\leq R} |f|\)

Then

\[ |a_k|\leq \frac{M}{R^k}. \ \blacklozenge \]

\[ |a_k|=|\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z_0)^{k+1}}dw |\leq\frac{1}{2\pi}\cdot M\cdot \frac{2\pi R}{R^{k+1}}=\frac{M}{R^k} \]

控制了函數值就能控制系數\(a_k\)

Liouville定理

f: entire function if \(f\in O(\mathbb{C})\)

e.g. \(e^x,\sin x, p(x)\) polynomial

\[ e^z=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{z^k}{k!} \]

\[ \sin x=\frac{e^{iz}-e^{-iz}}{2i},\quad \cos z=\frac{e^{iz}+e^{-iz}}{2} \]

Theo (Liouville)

Any bounded entire functions is constant \(\blacklozenge\)

pf. 1

\[ f(z)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}a_kz^k,\quad |f(z)|\leq M, \forall z\in\mathbb{C} \]

\[ \therefore |a_k|\leq \frac{M}{R^k} \]

当\(k\geqslant 1\)时,

\[ |a_k|\leqslant \lim_{R\rightarrow \infty}\frac{M}{R^k}=0 \]

\[ \therefore f(z)=f(0)\ \blacksquare \]

pf. 2

\(z\in \mathbb{C}\), choose \(R>|z|\)

\[ \begin{aligned} |f(z)-f(0)|&=\bigg|\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{|w|=R}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw-\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{|w|=R}\frac{f(w)}{w}dw\bigg|\\ &=\bigg|\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{|w|=R}(\frac{1}{w-z}-\frac 1w)f(w)dw \bigg|\\ &\leqslant \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{|w|=R}|\frac{z}{w(w-z)}|\cdot |f(w)|\cdot |dw|\\ &\leqslant \frac{1}{2\pi i}\cdot M\cdot \frac{|z|}{R(R-|z|)}\cdot 2\pi R\\ &=\frac{M|z|}{i(R-|z|)}\rightarrow 0\quad (R\rightarrow \infty)\ \blacksquare \end{aligned} \]

\((w-z)\)邊界到圓內一點的距離一定\(\geqslant R-|z|\)

代數基本定理

Theo (Fundamental theorem of algebra)

let \(p(z)\) be a complex-valued polynomial of \(\deg P\geqslant 1\).

Then \(\exists w\in \mathbb{C}, \ s.t.\ p(w)=0\) \(\blacklozenge\)

pf. \(p(z)=az+b\quad a\neq 0\), \(w=-\frac{b}{a}\)

Assume \(\deg P=k\geqslant 2\)

pf. 1

Assume \(p(z)\neq 0, \forall z\in \mathbb{C}\)

\[ \therefore q(z)=\frac{1}{p(z)}\in O(\mathbb{C}) \]

\[ \begin{aligned} |q(z)|&=\frac{1}{|a_kz^k+a_{k-1}z^{k-1}+\cdots+a_1z+a_0|}\\ &=\frac{1}{|z|^k\cdot |a_k+\frac{a_{k-1}z^{k-1}+\cdots+a_1z+a_0}{z^k}|}\\ &\leqslant \frac{2}{|a_k|\cdot |z|^k} \end{aligned} \]

最後一步是因為 \[ \frac{|a_k|}{2}\leqslant |a_k+\frac{a_{k-1}z^{k-1}+\cdots+a_1z+a_0}{z^k}| \]

当\(z\rightarrow \infty\)时，\(|q(z)|\rightarrow 0\)

\(\therefore q\) is bounded, entire

By Liouville, \(q\equiv c\), const

\[ \therefore p(z) \text{ is a constant function} \]

矛盾 \(\blacksquare\).

pf. 2 用最根本的Cauchy定理證

Assume \(p(z)\neq 0, \forall z\in \mathbb{C}\) and \(\big[\)\(p(x)\) is real if \(z=x\in \mathbb{R}\)\(\big]\).

If \([ \ ]\) does not hold, then consider \(p(z)\bar{p}(z)=Q(z)\), \[ \bar{p}(z)=\bar{a_k}z^k+\bar{a_{k-1}}z^{k-1}+\cdots +\bar{a_1}z+\bar{a_0} \]

Set \(a_1=x_1+iy_1, a_2=x_2+iy_2\)

\[ a_1\bar{a_2}+a_2\bar{a_1}=x_1x_2+y_1y_2\in \mathbb{R} \]

Set

\[ I=\int_0^{2\pi}\frac{d\theta}{p(2\cos \theta)}\neq 0 \]

在\(\theta\in[0,2\pi]\)上，\(2\cos \theta\in [-1,1]\)，\(I\neq 0\)沒有問題

\[ p(z)=a_kz^k+a_{k-1}z^{k-1}+\cdots+a_1z+a_0 \]

\(z=e^{i\theta}=\cos \theta+i\sin\theta\)

所以\(\displaystyle \cos\theta=\frac{z+\bar{z}}{2}=\frac{1}{2}(z+\frac{1}{z})\Rightarrow2\cos\theta =z+\frac{1}{z}\)

\[ \begin{aligned} p(2\cos\theta)&=a_k(z+\frac{1}{z})^k+a_{k-1}(z+\frac{1}{z})^{k-1}+\cdots+a_1(z+\frac{1}{z})+a_0\\ &=\frac{1}{z^k}Q(z) \end{aligned} \]

If \(z=0\), \(Q(0)=a_k\neq 0\)，最高次係數不為0

If \(z\neq 0\), \(p(2\cos\theta)\)也是个多项式，\(p(2\cos \theta)\neq 0\)，所以\(Q(z)\neq 0\)

既然\(Q(z)\)總是不為0，把它放在分母上仍是解析函數

\[ I=\int_{0}^{2\pi }\frac{d\theta}{p(2\cos\theta)} \xrightarrow[d\theta=\frac{dz}{iz}]{dz=ie^{i\theta}d\theta}\int_{|z|=1}\frac{z^k}{izQ(z)}dz \]

由Cauchy定理 \[ I=\int_{|z|=1}\frac{z^{k-1}}{iQ(z)}dz=0 \]

矛盾. \(\blacksquare\)

entry.title: 柯西積分公式
entry.content:
複變最重要的兩個定理！

Theo : (Cauchy's integral formula) Let \(D\) be a bounded domain in \(\mathbb{C}\) with piecewise smooth doundary. Suppose \(f\in C^1(\bar{D})\), Then \[ f(w)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\oint_{\partial D}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dw-\frac{1}{\pi}\iint_D \frac{\displaystyle{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy,\quad \forall w\in D \]

where \(z=x+iy\).

consider \(D_{\varepsilon}=D/\bar{B_{\varepsilon}}\), \(B_{\epsilon}=B(w;\epsilon)\)

挖掉圓盤后有內外两個邊界，曲線積分等于外圍的減內圍的

\[ \begin{aligned} \oint_{\partial D_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dz&=2i\iint_{D_{\epsilon}}\frac{\partial}{\partial \bar{z}}\left(\frac{f(z)}{z-w}\right)dxdy \\ &=2i\iint_{D_{\epsilon}}\frac{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy \quad \star \end{aligned} \]

\[ \oint_{\partial D_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dz=\oint_{\partial D}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dz-\oint_{\partial B_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dz \quad \star \]

set \(z=w+\epsilon e^{i\theta}\), \(z-w=\epsilon e^{i\theta}\)

\[ \begin{aligned} \oint_{\partial B_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dz&=\oint_{\partial B_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(w+\epsilon e^{i\theta})}{\epsilon e^{i\theta}}dz\\ &=\int_0^{2\pi} \frac{f(w+\epsilon e^{i\theta})}{\epsilon e^{i\theta}}i\epsilon e^{i\theta}d\theta\\ &=i\int_0^{2\pi}f(w+\epsilon e^{i\theta})d\theta\\ &\xrightarrow{\epsilon\rightarrow0} i\int_0^{2\pi}f(w)d\theta\\ &=2\pi if(w) \end{aligned} \]

下面考慮這個積分

\[ 2i\iint_{D_{\epsilon}}\frac{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy \]

因为\(f\)是\(C^1\)函数，\(\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}(z)\in C(\bar{D})\)

Cauchy Kernel

\[ \iint_K \bigg| \frac{1}{z-w} \bigg| dxdy<\infty \]

K: compact

因為會收斂(用極座標)

\[ \iint_B\frac{1}{|z|}dxdy=\int_{0}^{2\pi}\int_0^R\frac 1r rdrd\theta \]

let \(\epsilon\rightarrow 0\)

\[ 2i\iint_{D_{\epsilon}}\frac{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy\rightarrow 2i\iint_{D}\frac{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy \]

所以\(\epsilon\rightarrow 0\)時

\[ \oint_{\partial D}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dz-2\pi if(w)=2i\iint_{D}\frac{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy \]

\[ \therefore f(w)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\oint_{\partial D}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dw-\frac{1}{\pi}\iint_D \frac{\displaystyle{\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}}(z)}{z-w}dxdy\quad \blacksquare \]

Theo Let \(D\subset \mathbb{C}\) be a simply-connected domain, suppose \(f\in C^1(D)\cap O(D)\). Then \[ f(w)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\oint_{\partial D}\frac{f(z)}{z-w}dw\quad w\in \Omega \]

\(\Omega\): region surrounded by the simple closed curve \(C\)

simply connected 是為了保證\(C\)圍出來的還在\(D\)裡面，避免下面這種情況

Theo (Cauchy)

Let \(D\) be a simply connected domain in \(\mathbb{C}\),

\(C\): simple closed curve in \(D\)

If \(f\in O(D)\). Then

\[ \oint_C f(z)dz=0 \]

之前有\(C^1\)是為了訴諸於格林定理，但證明這個定理不能用格林，要用完全不同的想法

\(R\): rectangle

\(L\): length of \(\partial R\)

Claim: \(\oint_{\partial R}f(z)dz=0\)

反證法

Assume \(\exists R\) s.t. \[ \oint_{\partial R}f(z)dz=A\neq 0 \]

切割，對大长方形積一次，相當於對四個小长方形各積一次

\[ \oint_Rf(z)dz=\sum_{k=1}^4\oint_{R^{(k)}}f(z)dz \]

\[ \therefore \exists R_1=R^{(j)} \ \text{some }j, \quad s.t. \bigg|\oint_{\partial R_1}f(z)dz \bigg|\geq \frac{A}{4} \]

\[ \bigg|\oint_{\partial R_2}f(z)dz \bigg|\geq \frac{A}{4^2} \]

obtain a seq. of rectangle \(\{R_n\}\)

\[ \bigg|\oint_{\partial R_n}f(z)dz \bigg|\geq \frac{A}{4^n} \]

By Cantor intersection theorem \[ \exists P_0\in R_n, \ \forall n\quad P_0\in D \]

Write near \(P_0\)

\[ f(z)=f(P_0)+f'(P_0)(z-P_0)+\epsilon (z)(z-P_0) \]

\(\epsilon\rightarrow 0\) as \(z\rightarrow P_0\)

n 很大時，\(f(z)\)可以用\(f(P_0)+f'(P_0)(z-P_0)+\epsilon (z)(z-P_0)\)替換

\[ \oint_{\partial R_n}\left[f(P_0)+f'(P_0)(z-P_0)+\epsilon (z)(z-P_0)\right]dz \]

多項式一定是某個函數的微分， \[ \therefore f(P_0)+f'(P_0)(z-P_0)=Q'(z) \]

\(Q(z)\): polynomial of degree at most 2

\(z=\gamma(t)\)

\[ \begin{aligned} &\oint_{\partial R_n}[f(P_0)+f'(P_0)(z-P_0)]dz\\ =&\oint_{\partial R_n}Q'(z)dz\\ =&\int_a^bQ'(z)\gamma'(t)dt\\ =&\int_a^bd(Q(z))\\ =& Q(\gamma(b))-Q(\gamma(a))=0\quad \text{首尾相连} \end{aligned} \]

因為 \[ |\oint_{\partial R_n}dz|=|\int_a^b\gamma'(t)dt|\leq \int_a^b|\gamma'(t)|dt=Ln \] \((z-P_0)\)小于等于\(Ln\)（圓心到邊界的連線\(\leqslant\)周長），\(dz\)積分也小於\(Ln\)，所以兩次。\(\epsilon\)用最大值提出來 \[ \begin{aligned} &|\oint_{\partial R_n}\left[f(P_0)+f'(P_0)(z-P_0)+\epsilon (z)(z-P_0)\right]dz|\\ =&|\oint_{\partial R_n}\epsilon (z)(z-P_0)dz|\\ \leq &\max_{z\in \partial R_n}|\epsilon(z)|\cdot L_n^2 \end{aligned} \]

由于 \(\displaystyle{L_n=\frac{L}{2^n}}\)

\[ \max_{z\in \partial R_n}|\epsilon(z)|\cdot \left(\frac{L}{2^n}\right)^2\geq \frac{|A|}{4^n} \]

當\(n\rightarrow \infty\)時，\(\max_{z\in \partial R_n}|\epsilon(z)|\rightarrow 0\)

\[ \therefore \max_{z\in \partial R_n}|\epsilon(z)|\geq \frac{|A|}{L^2}\Rightarrow 0\geq \frac{|A|}{L^2}\quad \text{矛盾}. \]

目前證得在所有的長方形上 \[ \oint_{\partial R}f(z)dz=0 \ \square \]

這個函數\(F(z)\)必須well-defined：不管路徑怎麼選，積出來都一樣

要證明它well-defined

\[ \Leftrightarrow F(z)=\int_{\Gamma_1}f(z)dz=\int_{\Gamma_2}f(z)dz \]

因為每段路徑平行於\(x\)或\(y\)轴，可以視作長方形的一部分。借助剛才的準備工作，

\[ \int_{\Gamma_1-\Gamma_2}f(z)dz=\int_{\Gamma_1}f(z)dz-\int_{\Gamma_2}f(z)dz=0\quad \square \]

所以它是well-defined

Claim \[ F'(z)=f(z) \]

\[ \begin{aligned} \lim_{z\rightarrow w}\frac{F(z)-F(w)}{z-w}&=\lim_{z\rightarrow w}\frac{\int_{\Gamma+C}f(\eta)d\eta-\int_{\Gamma}f(\eta)d\eta}{z-w}\\ &=\lim_{z\rightarrow w}\frac{\int_Cf(\eta)d\eta}{z-w}\\ &=\lim_{z\rightarrow w}\frac{\int_Cf(w)d\eta+[\int_Cf(\eta)d\eta-\int_Cf(w)d\eta]}{z-w}\\ &=f(w)\quad \square \end{aligned} \]

\(f(w)\)是常數，\(\int_Cf(w)d\eta=f(w)(z-w)\)，後一項趨於0

\[ \begin{aligned} \oint_Cf(z)dz&=\oint_CF'(z)dz\\ &=\int_a^bF'(\gamma(t))\gamma'(t)dt\\ &=\int_a^b dF(\gamma(t))\\ &=F(\gamma(b))-F(\gamma(a))=0. \quad \blacksquare \end{aligned} \]

Theo(Cauchy's integral formula)

Let \(D\) be a simply-connected domain in \(\mathbb{C}\),

\(C\): simple closed curve

\(f\in O(D)\), let \(\Omega\) be the region surrounded by \(C\)

Then

\[ f(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw\quad w\in \Omega \]

區域內的點的函數值完完全全受邊界點函數值的影響，可以又邊界生成

卷积 convolution \[ f\rightarrow g(z)=\int f(w)g(z-w)dw \]

\(\displaystyle{\frac{1}{w-z}}\): Cauchy kernel (reproducing kernel)

\(\Omega/\bar{B_{\epsilon}}=\Omega_{\epsilon}\)

\[ \int_{\partial \Omega_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw=0 \]

上一個定理證得：解析函數在它的邊界積分等於0，因為\(w=z\)被挖掉了，而且\(\displaystyle \frac{1}{w-z}\)有極限，所以\(\displaystyle \frac{f(w)}{w-z}\)是解析函數

\[ \int_{\partial \Omega=C}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw-\int_{\partial B_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw=0 \]

因為\(\epsilon\rightarrow 0\)時， \[ \int_{\partial B_{\epsilon}}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw\rightarrow 2\pi if(z) \]

\[ \int_{C}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw=2\pi if(z)\Rightarrow f(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{C}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw \quad \blacksquare \]

(Theo) Let D be a domain in \(\mathbb{C}\), let \(f_n\in O(D), n\in \mathbb{N}\), If \(f_n\) uniformly converges on compact subsets (u.c.c.) of \(D\) to \(f\), then

\[ f\in O(D) \ 且\ f_n'\rightarrow f'\quad u.c.c.\ on \ D \]

在real上考慮\(\displaystyle f_n(x)=\frac{\sin nx}{\sqrt{n}}\)，\(f_n\rightarrow f\equiv 0\) uniformly on \(\mathbb{R}\). 但\(f_n'(x)=\sqrt{n}\cos nx\), \(f'_n(0)=\sqrt{n}\)，不收斂於\(f\equiv 0\)

複變的表現很不一樣

pf.

\(f\in C(D)\), choose \(\bar{B}(z_0;\delta)\subset D\), \(z\in B(z_0;\delta)\)

\[ f_n(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma_{\delta}}\frac{f_n(w)}{w-z}dw \]

對等式兩邊求極限\(\displaystyle \lim_{n\rightarrow \infty}\)

\[ f(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma_{\delta}}\frac{f(w)}{w-z}dw \]

求導

\[ f_n'(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma_{\delta}}\frac{f_n(w)}{(w-z)^2}dw \]

\[ n\rightarrow\infty\quad \Downarrow \quad \text{uniformly on a smaller disc} \]

\[ f'(z)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Gamma_{\delta}}\frac{f(w)}{(w-z)^2}dw \]

相當於收斂函數從原來的\(f\)變成\(f/(w-z)\)

entry.title: 解析函數
entry.content:
Complex numbers \(\mathbb{C}\)

\[ (a,b)\quad a,b\in \mathbb{R} \]

Define operations \(+,\cdot\)

  1. \((a,b)+(c,d)=(a+c,b+d)\)
  2. \((a,b)\cdot (c,d)=(ac-bd,ad+bc)\)

\(\therefore \mathbb{C}\)形成一個 field

\[ \mathbb{R}\quad a\in \mathbb{R} \]

\[ a\mapsto (a,0) \]

\[ (a,0)\cdot (c,d)=(ac,ad) \]

\[ a(c,d)=(ac,ad) \]

\[ (0,1)\cdot (0,1)=(0-1,0)=(-1,0) \]

Denote \((0,1)=i\), \(i^2=-1\), \(x^2+1=0\).

\[ z\in \mathbb{C}\rightarrow z=a+ib \]

\[ \begin{aligned} z&=(a,b)\\ &=(a,0)+(0,b)\\ &=a+b(0,1)\\ &=a+ib \end{aligned} \]

\(a=\Re z\), real part

\(b=\Im z\), imaginary part

\(|z|=\sqrt{a^2+b^2}\), modulus

\(\bar{z}=a-ib\), complex conjugate

\[ z,w\in \mathbb{C} \]

Define \[ d(z,w)=|z-w| \]

Thus: \(z,w\in \mathbb{C}\)

\[ |z+w|\leqslant |z|+|w| \]

\((\mathbb{C},d)\): metric space

open ball centered at \(z\) with radius \(r\)

\[ B(z;r)=\{w\in \mathbb{C}\big | |w-z|<r\} \]

\[ f: \Omega\rightarrow \mathbb{C}\quad \Omega\subset \mathbb{C} \]

\(\Omega\) 是 \(\mathbb{C}\) 的一個(connected open) domain，現在在\(\Omega\)上選一個點

\[ z_0\in \Omega \]

\(f\) is said to be differentiable at \(z_0\), if \(\displaystyle{\lim_{z\rightarrow z_0}\frac{f(z)-f(z_0)}{z-z_0}}\) exists, denoted by \(f'(z_0)\)

If \(f\) is diff. at every point of \(\Omega\), then we say \(f\) is a holomorphic function （解析函數/全純函數） on \(\Omega\).

\[ O(\Omega)=\{\text{all of the holomorphic functions on }\Omega \} \]

有\(S\subset \mathbb{C}\) set, \(f\in O(S)\) means, \(f\) is holomorphic on some open neighborhood of \(S\).

\[ \frac{\partial u}{\partial x}(z_0)=\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}(z_0) \]

\[ \frac{\partial u}{\partial y}(z_0)=-\frac{\partial v}{\partial x}(z_0) \]

Cauchy-Riemann eq.

可導 \(\Rightarrow\) 柯西黎曼方程，但柯西黎曼方程 \(\nRightarrow\) 可導

例.

\[ u(x,y)=\begin{cases} \displaystyle{\frac{x^3-y^3}{x^2+y^2}} & (x,y)\neq (0,0)\\ 0 & (x,y)= (0,0) \end{cases} \]

\[ v(x,y)=\begin{cases} \displaystyle{\frac{x^3+y^3}{x^2+y^2}} & (x,y)\neq (0,0)\\ 0 & (x,y)= (0,0) \end{cases} \]

\[ \frac{\partial u}{\partial x}(0,0)=1, \frac{\partial u}{\partial y}(0,0)=-1 \]

\[ \frac{\partial v}{\partial x}(0,0)=1, \frac{\partial v}{\partial y}(0,0)=1 \]

滿足柯西黎曼方程

along \(x\)-axis \[ \lim \frac{f(x,0)-f(0,0)}{x}=\frac{x+ix-0}{x}=1+i \]

along \(x=y\) \[ \lim \frac{f(x,x)-f(0,0)}{x+ix}=\frac{ix}{x+ix}=\frac{i}{1+i}=\frac{1+i}{2} \]

If \(f\in C^1(\Omega)\)

Set Cauchy-Riemann operator

\[ \frac{\partial}{\partial \bar{z}}=\frac 12\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x}+i\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \right) \]

\[ \begin{aligned} \frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}} & = \frac 12 \left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x}+i\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \right)(u+iv) \\ &= \frac 12\left (\left (\frac{\partial u}{\partial x}-\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}\right)+i\left(\frac{\partial u}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial v}{\partial x}\right) \right)\\ &=0 \end{aligned} \]

在滿足柯西黎曼方程的情况下

\[ \Leftrightarrow f\in O(\Omega) \]

複變這門學問就是在研究這個方程式： \[ \frac{\partial u}{\partial \bar{z}}=g \]

\(g=0\)时，是解析函數

講点微積分。

Curve

\[ \gamma: [a,b]\rightarrow \mathbb{C} \]

\[ t\mapsto \gamma(t)=(x(t),y(t)) \]

應該是 \(t\in [a,b],\ \gamma(t)\in \mathbb{C}\)

Smooth curve \[ \gamma \in C^1([a,b]), \ and \ \ \gamma'(t)\neq 0\ \ on\ \ (a,b) \]

Piecewise smooth \[ \gamma: [a,b]\rightarrow \mathbb{C} \]

\[ \exists P=\{a=t_0<t_1<\cdots <t_{n-1}<t_n=b\} \]

\[ s.t. \quad \gamma \text{ is smooth on each }[t_{j-1},t_j], 1\leqslant j\leqslant n \]

Theo (Green)

\(D\) is a bounded domain in \(\mathbb{R}^2\) with piecewise smooth boundary \(\partial D\), let \(P,Q\) be two functions which is \(C^1\) in some open neighborhood of \(\bar{D}\). Assume \(\partial D\) is positively oriented. (沿邊界走時domain在左邊)

\(\bar{D}=cl (D)\), closure of \(D\)

Then

\[ \oint_C Pdx+Qdy=\iint_D \left(\frac{\partial Q}{\partial x}-\frac{\partial P}{\partial y} \right)dxdy \]

Theo. Let \(D\) be a simply connected domain in \(\mathbb{C}\)

Suppose \(f\in C^1(D)\), then \[ f\in O(D)\Leftrightarrow \oint_{\Gamma} f(z)dz=0 \]

for every piecewise smooth simple closed curve \(\Gamma\) in \(D\)

simply connected 說明兩件事

  1. arcwise connected： 任何兩個點都能用arc連起來
  2. \(\pi_1(D)=0\)： domain内每個封閉曲線都能縮成一個點（没有洞）

simple：曲線除了起點和終點都不會自我相交

closed：起點和終點是同一個點

\(\Omega\): region surrounded by \(\Gamma\).

\[ \begin{aligned} \oint_{\Gamma} f(z)dz & = \oint_{\Gamma}f(z)(dx+idy) \\ & = \iint_{\Omega}\left(i\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}-\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\right)dxdy \\ & = i\iint_{\Omega}\left(\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}+i\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\right)dxdy \\ & = 2i\iint_{\Omega}\frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}dxdy \end{aligned} \]

\[ \oint_{\Gamma} f(z)dz=0\Leftrightarrow \frac{\partial f}{\partial \bar{z}}=0\ on\ D.\ \blacksquare \]

entry.title: 七月加州
entry.content:
很多人说做量化要读统计phd，我也思考了很久。

这种说法是从结果倒退过程，首先所有读统计phd的只有少部分进入quant，其次他们选择读统计phd并不为了进quant。phd本身难度很大，不是对专业有极大研究兴趣的人没法读下来。出来以后quant才成为一个选项，从最早就计划做quant而读phd的少之又少。就美国的体系而言，想做学术的读phd，以在美国找工作为目的的读master，我不想读phd。

7.17统计出成绩，比我预想的最低分还低。想到处找人倾诉，但身边是数学远不如我的意大利人和无所谓绩点的家伙。心情一直很差，甚至看到食物都反胃，饭也没吃。跟小龙虾随便找了个披萨店，去逛Moe书店。在书店里我想通了。看绩点就像股票盯盘，一直看它没有意义，只不过是个数字罢了。难道我3.0就代表我学了跟没学一样吗？我只是考试不高而已，并不否认在理解程度上跟高分有差距，但我终究是学了，知道假设检验是什么、\(t\)分布、\(\chi^2\)分布、拒真受假两种错误、ANOVA...这些才是我的收获，而不是这样一个方程

\[ f(GPA)=\begin{cases}1 & GPA\geq 3.7\\0 & GPA\leq 3.7\end{cases} \]

我会接着学数学，并不是为了刷高数学课绩点来证明自己的水平（教育并不只为区分智商存在），而是这些东西对金融工程有用。

7.31去了趟斯坦福，那边真是贵气：设施更全面，建筑有美感，有历史韵味，学生看起来很聪明，甚至还有高尔夫球场。在去球场的路上看到个精壮的白发老人穿运动装跑步，被这种不服老的抗争精神震撼到。中国圈养羊，美国全是狼。狼进羊圈牧羊人就有麻烦了，但狼进狼群只会壮大队伍。

呃呃，到月底我打算转统计硕了，现在Dream school 是 NC State，另外它的统计program有金融方向。我去问了ucb统计系的admission office，主要是担心我数统只有3.0怎么办。他说你可以在statement of personal history里说明为什么这门课考的差，比如上学期因为有work，耽误了，但下学期又修了一遍，考的好。会看重working experience，因为ucb这个是就业导向。Finance也可以申，但这个方向人少，占8%。平均绩点3.2的也有申请成功案例，非常好的statement和working experience。平均绩点在3.8。每年收到600多份，录80多人，最后50多人接受。竞争激烈，每科都要分数高。

当天下午的 Graduate School Workshop 也强调一点：GPA和GRE是baseline。所以说美国申请要求比港英只高不低，不仅同样要求高绩点等硬件，还要有丰富的extra-curriculum活动和working experience。之前因为知道了中介的套路所以没怎么焦虑，现在又有点了。尤其我转统计硕，还要学很多课，不容易呢。

entry.title: 特殊微分方程的解
entry.content:
Separable Variables

当\(x,y\)可分离时， \[ Q(x,y)\frac{dy}{dx}+P(x,y)=0\tag{6.6} \] \[ P(x,y)dx+Q(x,y)dy=0\tag{6.61} \]

\[ \Rightarrow f(x)dx+g(y)dy=0\tag{6.62} \] \[ \Rightarrow \int f(x)dx+\int g(y)dy=C\tag{6.63} \]

Def 7.1 Let \(z=f(x,y)\) define \(z\) as a function of \(x\) and \(y\) in a region \(R\). The function \(f(x,y)\) is said to be homogeneous of order n if it can be written as

\[ f(x,y)=x^ng(u)\tag{7.11} \]

where \(u=\dfrac yx\) and \(g(u)\) is a function of \(u\); or alternately if it can be written as

\[ f(x,y)=y^nh(u)\tag{7.11} \]

where \(u=\dfrac xy\) and \(h(u)\) is a function of \(u\)

也可定义为：A function \(f(x,y)\) is said to be homogeneous of order n if \[f(tx,ty)=t^nf(x,y)\tag{7.16}\]

Homogeneous Coefficients

Definition 7.2. The differential equation \[P(x,y)dx+Q(x,y)dy=0\tag{7.3}\] where \(P(x,y)\) and \(Q(x,y)\) are each homogeneous functions of order \(n\) is called a first order differential equation with homogeneous coefficients.

Theorem 7.32. If the coefficients in \((7.3)\) are each homogeneous function of order \(n\), then the substitution in it of \((7.31),(7.33)\) will lead to an equation in which the variables are separable.

\[y=ux\ \Leftarrow \ \left(u=\frac{y}{x}\right),\quad dy=udx+xdu,\quad \tag{7.31}\]

\[x=uy\ \Leftarrow \ \left(u=\frac{x}{y}\right),\quad dx=udy+ydu,\quad \tag{7.33}\]

Linear Coefficients

\[ x=\bar{x}+h,\quad y=\bar{y}+k\tag{8.11} \] \[ \Rightarrow \bar{x}=x-h,\quad \bar{y}=y-k\tag{8.12} \] 解线性系数的微分方程， \[ (a_1x+b_1y+c_1)dx+(a_2x+b_2y+c_2)dy=0\tag{8.2} \]

两条直线不平行

Method 1

两条直线不平行，因而相交，设交点为\((h,k)\)，是新的原点\((h,k)=(\bar{0},\bar{0})\)。把\((8.11)\)替换进\((8.2)\)，由交点的性质，常数项可忽略。 \[ a_1h+b_1k+c_1=0 \] \[ a_2h+b_2k+c_2=0 \]

转换成homogenous的形式 \[ (a_1\bar{x}+b_1\bar{y})d\bar{x}+(a_2\bar{x}+b_2\bar{y})d\bar{y}=0\tag{8.24} \]

Method 2

换元 \[ u=a_1x+b_1y+c_1\tag{8.3} \] \[ v=a_2x+b_2y+c_2 \] 微分 \[ du=a_1dx+b_1dy\tag{8.31} \] \[ dv=a_2dx+b_2dy \] 解方程，用\(du,dv\)表示\(dx,dy\)，代入\((8.2)\)式，再用homogenous的方法。

两条直线平行

Method 1失效。只能换元，都用\(u\)表示 \[ (2x+3y-1)dx+(4x+6y+2)dy=0 \] \[ u=2x+3y-1, \quad \Rightarrow\quad 4x+6y+2=2u+4 \] 然后就回到\(u\)和\(x\)或\(y\)组成的homogenous形式。

Exact DE

  1. Riemann integral \[ \lim_{n\rightarrow \infty}\sum_{k=1}^nf(x_k)\Delta x_k=\int_a^bf(x)dx \]

  2. 微积分基本定理 \[ F(x)=\int_{x_0}^xf(u)du \tag{9.13} \]

\[ \rightarrow F'(x)=f(x), \quad a<x<b\tag{9.14} \]

  1. 要让 \[\int_{x_0}^xP(x,y)dx+\int_{y_0}^yQ(x,y)dy\tag{9.16}\] 有定义，必须\([x_0,x]\times [y_0,y]\subset D\)

Definition 9.19. A region is called a simply connected region if every simple closed curve lying entirely in the region encloses only points of the region.

shrink closed curve to a point without non-domain points getting on the way

其实就是单连通域，对应的是多连通域

要让\((9.16)\)有定义

  1. 共同定义域是S.C. region \(R\)
  2. \((x_0,y_0)\in R\)
  3. 长方形\([x_0,x]\times [y_0,y]\subset R\)

Def 9.23 \[ P(x,y)dx+Q(x,y)dy\tag{9.24} \] is called an exact differential if it is the total differential of a function \(f(x,y)\). \[ P(x,y)=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}f(x,y)\quad Q(x,y)=\frac{\partial}{\partial y}f(x,y)\tag{9.241} \]

Def 9.27 \[ P(x,y)dx+Q(x,y)dy\tag{9.28}=0 \] is called exact differential equation if follows \((9.241)\).

Theorem 9.3. A necessary and sufficient condition that the differential equation \[ P(x,y)dx+Q(x,y)dy\tag{9.31}=0 \] be exact is that \[ \frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y\tag{9.32}) \]

解法一：

套公式 \(\displaystyle{f(x,y)=\int_{x_0}^x P(x,y)dx+\int_{y_0}^y Q(x_0,y)dy}=c\)

或\(\displaystyle{f(x,y)=\int_{y_0}^yQ(x,y)dy+\int_{x_0}^xP(x,y_0)dx}=c\)

解法二： \[ P(x,y)dx+Q(x,y)dy=0 \] By \(\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial x}f(x,y)=P(x,y)}\), \[ f(x,y)=\int P(x,y)dx+R(y)\tag{$\star$} \] 再由 \[ \frac{\partial}{\partial y}f(x,y)=Q(x,y) \] \[ \underbrace{\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \int P(x,y)dx}_{\displaystyle{\int \frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)dx}}+R'(y)=Q(x,y) \] 解出\(R(y)\)再代回\((\star)\)式.

Number Exact Diff Eq Solution
\((10.2)\) \(ydx+xdy\) \(xy=c\)
\((10.21)\) \(2xydx+x^2dy=0\) \(x^2y=c\)
\((10.22)\) \(y^2dx+2xydy=0\) \(xy^2=c\)
\((10.23)\) \(2xy^2dx+2x^2ydy=0\) \(x^2y^2=c\)
\((10.24)\) \(3x^2y^3dx+3x^3y^2dy=0\) \(x^2y^2=c\)
\((10.25)\) \(3x^2ydx+x^3dy=0\) \(x^3y=c\)
\((10.26)\) \(y\cos xdx+\sin xdy=0\) \(y\sin x=c\)
\((10.27)\) \(\sin ydx+x\cos ydy=0\) \(x\sin y=c\)
\((10.28)\) \(ye^{xy}dx+xe^{xy}dy=0\) \(e^{xy}=c\)
\((10.29)\) \(\displaystyle{\frac{dx}{x}+\frac{dy}{y}=0}\) \(\log (xy)=c\)
\((10.3)\) \(\displaystyle{\frac{ydx-xdy}{y^2}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\frac xy}=c\)
\((10.31)\) \(\displaystyle{-\frac{ydx-xdy}{x^2}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\frac yx}=c\)
\((10.32)\) \(\displaystyle{\frac{2xydy-y^2dx}{x^2}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\frac {y^2}{x}}=c\)
\((10.33)\) \(\displaystyle{\frac{2xydx-x^2dy}{y^2}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\frac {x^2}{y}}=c\)
\((10.34)\) \(\displaystyle{\frac{xdy-ydx}{x^2+y^2}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\arctan \frac {y}{x}}=c\)
\((10.35)\) \(\displaystyle{2\frac{xdy-ydx}{x^2-y^2}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\arctan \log \frac {x+y}{x-y}}=c\)
\((10.39)\) \(\displaystyle{-\frac{y^3dx-xy^2dy}{x^4}=0}\) \(\displaystyle{\arctan \log \frac {y^3}{3x^3}}=c\)
\((10.391)\) \(\displaystyle{\frac{xdx+ydy}{\sqrt{x^2+y^2}}=0}\) \(\sqrt{x^2+y^2}=c\)
\((10.392)\) $e{3x}dy+3e{3x}ydx=0 \(|\)e^{3x}y=c$

Integrating Factor

Def 10.5 A multiplying factor which converts an inexact diff eq into an exact one is called integrating factor.

\[ \frac{\partial}{\partial y}[hP(x,y)]=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}[hQ(x,y)]\tag{10.62 $\star$} \]

  1. \(h=h(x)\)

\[ \frac{dh(x)}{h(x)}=\frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y)}{Q(x,y)}dx\tag{10.64} \]

更特殊地，\(F(x)=\displaystyle{\frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y)}{Q(x,y)}}\)，所以\(\displaystyle{h(x)=e^{\int F(x)dx}}\)

  1. \(h=h(y)\)

\[ \frac{dh(y)}{h(y)}=\frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)}{P(x,y)}dy\tag{10.68} \]

  1. \(h=h(u), u=xy\)

\[ \frac{dh(u)}{h(u)}=\frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y)}{yQ(x,y)-xP(x,y)}du\tag{10.72} \]

  1. \(h=h(u),u=\frac xy\) \[ \frac{dh(u)}{h(u)}=\frac{y^2\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y)\right]}{xP(x,y)+yQ(x,y)}du\tag{10.76} \]

  2. \(h=h(u),u=\frac yx\)

\[ \frac{dh(u)}{h(u)}=\frac{x^2\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial x}Q(x,y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial y}P(x,y)\right]}{xP(x,y)+yQ(x,y)}du\tag{10.76} \]

Linear DE

Def 11.1 A linear diff eq of the first order is \[ \frac{dy}{dx}+P(x)y=Q(x)\tag{11.11} \]

Integrating factor is in the form \(\displaystyle{e^{\int P(x)dx}}\), by \((9.32)\).

\[ \left[P(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}y-Q(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}\right]dx+e^{\int P(x)dx}dy=0\tag{11.13} \]

\[ \underbrace{e^{\int P(x)dx}dy+P(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}ydx}_{d(e^{\int P(x)dx}y)}=Q(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}dx\tag{11.16} \]

\[ e^{\int P(x)dx}dy=\int Q(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}dx+C\tag{11.19} \]

This is a true general solution of \((11.11)\). \[ y=e^{-\int P(x)dx}\int Q(x)e^{\int P(x)dx}dx+Ce^{-\int P(x)dx}\tag{11.191} \]

Bernoulli Equation

\[ \frac{dy}{dx}+P(x)y=Q(x)y^n\tag{11.5} \]

两边同时乘以\((1-n)y^{-n}\) \[ (1-n)y^{-n}\frac{dy}{dx}+(1-n)P(x)y^{1-n}=(1-n)Q(x)\tag{11.52} \] \[ \frac{d}{dx}(\underbrace{y^{1-n}}_{u})+(1-n)P(x) \cdot \underbrace{y^{1-n}}_{u}=(1-n)Q(x)\tag{11.53} \] \(u=y^{1-n}\)，转化为线性DE的形式 \[ u'+(1-n)P(x) \cdot u=(1-n)Q(x)\tag{11.53} \]

Definition 2.68. A set in the plane is called a region if it satisfies the following two conditions: 1. Each point of the set is the center of a circle whose entire interior consists of points of the set. 2. Every two points of the set can be joined by a curve (not a line) which consists entirely of points of the set.

Definition 2.81. The relation \[ f(x,y)=0\tag{2.82} \] defines \(y\) as an implicit function of \(x\) on an interval \(I:a<x<b\), if there exists a function \(g(x)\) defined on \(I\) such that \[ f[x,g(x)]=0\tag{2.83} \] for every \(x\) in \(I\).

Definition 3.4. \(f(x)\) is a solution of the differential equation \[ F(x,y,y',\cdots,y^{(n)})=0\tag{3.41} \]

if

\[ F[x,f(x),f'(x),\cdots,f^{(n)}(x)]=0\tag{3.42} \]

Definition 3.6. A relation \(f(x,y)=0\) will be called an implicit solution of the differential equation

\[F(x,y,y',\cdots,y^{(n)})=0 \tag{3.61}\]

on an interval \(I:a<x<b\), if

  1. it defines \(y\) as an implicit function of \(x\) on \(I\),i.e., if there exists a function \(g(x)\) defined on \(I\) such that \(f[x,g(x)]=0\) for every \(x\) in \(I\), and if

  2. \(g(x)\) satisfies 3.61, i.e., if

\[ F[x,g(x),g'(x),\cdots,g^{(n)}(x)]=0 \tag{3.62} \]

for every \(x\) in \(I\).

Question:

\((e) xy'=2y\leftarrow y=x^2\), \((x\neq 0)\)

\((j)xy'+y=y^2\leftarrow y=\frac{2}{x+2}\), \((x\neq 0,-2)\)

Definition 4.3. The functions defined by

\[ y=f(x,c_1,c_2,\cdots,c_n)\tag{4.31} \]

of the \(n+1\) variables, \(x,c_1,c_2,\cdots,c_n\) will be called an n-parameter family of solutions of the \(n\)th order differential equation

\[F(x,y,y',\cdots,y^{(n)})=0\tag{4.32}\]

if \(\forall c_i(i=1,\cdots,n)\), the resulting function \(f(x)\) defined by \((4.31)\) satisfies \((4.32)\). That is

\[F(x,f,f',\cdots,f^{(n)})=0\tag{4.33}\]

\(n\) order \(\nLeftrightarrow\) \(n\) parameter solutions

\(\nLeftarrow\): \((y'-y)(y'-2y)=0\leftarrow (y-c_1e^x)(y-c_2e^{2x})=0\)

Definition 4.66. particular solution: does not contain arbitrary constants.

Definition 4.7. general solution: contains every particular solution

Definition 4.71. initial conditions: the \(n\) conditions that determine \(c_1,\cdots,c_n\), and given in terms of one value of the independent variable (e.g.给定\(t=0\)时，位置\(x=10\)，速度\(v=20\))

Definition 5.12. If \(y=f(x)\) or \(f(x,y)=0\) defines \(y\) as a function of \(x\) which satisfies \[y'=F(x,y), \quad a<x<b\tag{5.11}\] then the graph of this function is called an integral curve, it is the graph of a function which is the solution of \((5.11)\).

Remind

\[y'=F(x,y)\Leftrightarrow \text{Direction field}\tag{ODE}\]

\[y(x_0)=y_0 \Leftrightarrow \text{Point}\ (x_0,y_0)\tag{I.C.}\]

\[y(x) \Leftrightarrow \text{Integral curve}\tag{Solution}\]

Definition 5.4. An ordinary point of (5.11) lies on one and only one of its integral curves.

Definition 5.41. A singular point of (5.11) meets two requirements 1. NOT ordinary point: no/more than one integral curve 2. at least one ordinary point \(o_0\in \cup(s_0,\varepsilon),\forall \varepsilon\)

条件2排除了定义域外的无关点

Trap

Definition 6.13. Let \(y=f(x)\) define \(y\) as a function of \(x\) on an interval \(I\). The differential of y, written as \(dy\) (or \(df\)) is defined by \[ (dy)(x,\Delta x)=f'(x)\Delta x\tag{6.14} \]

Theorem 6.2. If \(y=x\), then \[(dy)(x,\Delta x)=(dx)(x,\Delta x)=\Delta x\tag{6.22}\]

\(dy\),\(dx\) are differentials, not increment. \(y,x\) after \(d\) are functions, not independent variables

entry.title: 周游LA、SD
entry.content:
飞机和住宿不贵，但在LA叫uber应该会花很多钱，预算100刀。在SD时间会比较充裕，多走走路。

Los Angeles

行：Aug 12，OAK-LA，$35.4（2人）

住：KC，位置, 8.12-14（2晚），235🔪

玩：Griffith Observatory，小东京，Getty Center，LACMA，UCLA，Getty Villa，Santa Monica，Venice Beach

环球影城无聊，不去。8.12早上到，先逛再入住。逛小东京，吃饭。下午逛LACMA。约5点，去天文台看日落（徒步/巴士）。8.13去UCLA，Getty center，Getty villa(optional)。下午去Santa Monica海滩和Venice Beach。8.14退房。

LACMA预约，大学生门票$21

Griffith门票免费，不用预约，官网。7:30~8pm日落

[Griffith_Park_Map.pdf][2]

Getty center和Getty villa免费但要预约

San Diego

行：坐火车到Santa Fe Depot，购票人均$36，约三小时。是中午12:10的那班，再早只有7点的了就太早。

住：John&Don，8.14-17（3晚），$378

玩：Gaslamp Quarter，Balboa Park，老城，La Jolla Cove，Geisel library，Midway Museum，UCSD

市中心的煤气灯街区看起来有点意思。老城是拉美风格。Balboa是欧式建筑，不用门票，看风景。海洋世界很有名，但门票太贵不划算。La Jolla能看到一堆海豹。

从 La Jolla Cove 向西走10分钟，有个叫 Children's Pool 的小海湾，这里的海豹特别多

观鲸出海，要预约，65刀。系统一直无法支付，就算了。Geisel图书馆是地标建筑，旁边的UCSD也顺便看一下。中途岛航母必看（不知道为什么必看），门票31刀，要预订。（后来支付失败了，白嫖一张门票）

回程

8.17回，下午2:20pm，机票$63.8（2人）。

Budget

Trip：(35.4+72+63.8)/2=85.6

Live：(246+378)/2=312

T&L: 86+312=$398

Ticket：21

出发

8.12

在奥克兰机场睡了一晚，本以为会很乱很危险，但因为机场在岛上远离市中心，环境还是很好的。做廉价spirit航班，体验比想象中好，至少没坠机且途中能让我睡着。到洛杉矶的时候还很早，先去了离机场很近的Santa Monica海滩，和Venice Beach，有点阴天，但海很开阔且人相对少，比大梅沙好多了。很多人在冲浪，充满活力，蛮喜欢的。

下午跟xlx去ucla闲逛，但他什么话也不说就一个劲的走，挺无语的，主要是我很累，就分头行动了。去了LACMA，司机说相对于艺术，它主要讲的是洛杉矶历史，诚哉斯言。花了$21门票，觉得东西有点少，还有有一部分在建。不过也有些喜欢的作品，毕加索不少画都在这边

A B

晚上本来想去Griffith看日落，但等公交浪费太久时间，来不及了，只好明天再看。但我想着出都出来了，索性去别处逛逛，就坐metro去小东京。地铁又脏又臭，大麻和汗水味纠缠在一起，让人作呕。下车后走了一段，沿途很多homeless，路上也脏的不行，一度很崩溃。当终于看到日文招牌时真的感觉像回到家一样。

我八月刚开始就一直homesick，想着国内的各种好。但这一刻我发觉，这是另一种形式的culture shock，只不过我一直没表现出来，自己也不知道。中日文化相近，同根同源，文化的亲和让我有种回家的感觉，国籍并不是边界，文化认同才是。随便找了个餐馆随便点了份おやこどん，非常幸福。

8.13

起个大早去Getty Center，等公交花了好长时间，结果到的很晚。我下车后徒步过去，走到一半没路了，看到Getty内部人员的通道，就去问我该怎样走进去。结果那人说：你在这坐会，待会有人来接你；就把我载上去了，直接到艺术馆。emm有点无语但很感激～

Getty里面超大，展品很密集，而每一幅都是能在画前欣赏很久的。我很喜欢painting，尤其19世纪以后的，但不喜欢sculpture。看画展有种读故事的感觉，读作者，读ta画的内容和现实背景，因此每幅画有至少三篇故事可读，非常有意思。看到了莫奈的日出印象和梵高的鸢尾花，后者实在是太popular了以致画前堆了两三圈人。逛了4小时，拍了很多照片。我打算回国后仔细研究下感兴趣的这些画，整理一下。

晚上和atsushi在Griffith天文台见面，背着落日拍了张合照，这么短的时间里结识到这样的朋友有点感动。日本人很客气，相处起来很舒服。下山路上我们什么都聊，怪有意思的。去了uber司机大哥推荐的sushistop，还真不错，价格也不算贵。在地铁站和atsushi拥抱告别，下次见面不知道是几年后。他目送我坐上地铁，在我离开他视线时再次挥手，我也在挥手，然后地铁把我越拉越远，很从容很美妙的告别。

8.14 出发去San Diego。刚一来就喜欢上这个城市：街道比LA干净，流浪汉没见到几个，周边有工地和高楼大厦——感觉回国了。对美国的最高评价便是如此。整顿完后已经有点晚，5pm的样子，我决定去Coronado岛上看一看，正好那边有小红书推荐的餐厅，Lobster West，吃龙虾卷。沿路一直被amaze，干净准时的公交，well-designed的公交线路，大桥上的俯瞰海景，都太可爱。岛上全是别墅，典型白人富人区，以后来这边买套房养老。xlx说这里的感觉和Florida一模一样。我们就朝着餐厅的大致方向随便乱走，至于哪个block右拐过马路无所谓，在这边走路本身就是享受。

龙虾卷超好吃，底下面包烤的很香，龙虾也是超多超新鲜。必须要在这边买房了，这样天天能吃到。

8.15

中途岛号没什么好看的，都是些老旧的飞机，我也不是军迷。甲板上海风超大，对面港口停着三艘现役的航母：CVN70,CVN71,CVN72，分别是文森号、罗斯福号和林肯号。

手机没电了，于是去UCSD找了个地方充。我问了个学生student union在哪，他不知道，我说没关系。结果往前走了几分钟他从后面追上来，给我介绍一些student union替代品，比如price center、geisel library啊，好热情哦。去price center充了会电，又去geisel学了一两个小时。图书馆超大，8层楼，除了顶层是学习区，其他楼层都有满满的书，48排书架，第四层甚至全都是关于 East Asia 的书。

1 2

讲真，如果是让我从ucb和ucsd里选，我会选uscd。

晚上逛了逛煤气灯街区，灯红酒绿，美女很多，主题词 声色犬马。全都是很嗨的bar，但我只想找个地方吃晚饭。小姐姐服务很周到，小费是自动按5%算的，我本来还以为会让我在机子上选15%,20%,25%，预估$60的餐实际上只有$51，surplus也赚麻了，不错。

entry.title: 六月總結
entry.content:
早上八点，太平洋上空

六月初，想到再过两周就考试周，这学期弄得很忙很忙最后还是到两周速成的境地，很不是滋味。谈判学小组最后一次讨论，学长学姐们人真的很好，很照顾我帮我拿高分。泽凯说我逻辑没什么问题，但不能快速抓住关键点。第一周过后压力大起来了，这时反骨属性显露出来，一个周五晚上一直在刷漫画。去洗手间洗杯子的路上，吹着芙蓉湖过来的热浪，有点羞愧。想到让人幸福的不是未来的展望、过去的回忆，而是当下所做是所愿之事。为了待会学习现在使劲玩，并不比现在就学更快乐。

我这学期共做过三四次计划，全都在第一天破产。积极地消灭todo是个陷阱，当把快感放在划掉todo的那一刻时就已经掉进去了。要让完成任务可持续，就要享受任务本身。否则效率会特别低，就像五月中旬时一样。快进考试周前的周末看了场辩论，北大打暨大，也很有收获。

进入考试周了，状态一下子变得紧张，想不想学只在一念之间。6.12周一把投资学过了一遍，攒了些问题去问mxl。老师真的很好，问完之后又聊了一会，跟美女老师聊天真的会开心。被夸“你可以的”“这样挺好”变得很安心。心想说有时候要唯心一点，我觉得是就是，我觉得会了就会了，我觉得自信就是自信，我觉得成熟就是成熟。不要太纠结找证据。

过去习惯了隐藏实力，是因为游刃有余，现在不用隐藏了，要不然真成蠢蛋。在大学利益冲突太激烈，很难说真心话。

老爸之前说“对印度人，不要瞧不起他们，也不要把他们太当回事”，笑死。不只是对印度人，对很多人和事都可以这样，比如上海人，比如21世纪杯。

考试周的总结已另成一篇，不再重复。\(\Rightarrow\) 不必再等

entry.title: 不必再等
entry.content:
考试周这四天，一天速成一门，有顺利的有不顺的，但是，以完成这门考试为最低目标，确实能激发出很大潜力。

平时学的少，总想着，还有明天，离考试还远。从时间价值来讲，现在拿到一块钱总比未来拿到要好。同样的，现在努力去学总比未来再学要好。考前能爆发这么大潜力，为什么平时不能？我猜是心太杂了。考试周我不看消息，不做计划，所有在心中一闪而过的待办都会立马忘记，只有眼下看的书做的题是真实的。平时要顾及很多事，这个活动、那个社交，都让人“没心思学”。回想起来，上学期我说，“多参加点活动就好了”，这学期确实有做到，但真的“好”了吗？似乎是把软实力放在硬实力之前了。而反观BEC的另一个落榜者，他真的有努力在提升硬实力也就是绩点，（统计期中90+已经说明了一切）。而我只收获了焦虑、放弃了努力的坚持。

这一向，想清楚了两层关系。一是绩点和能力。虽然绩点高不能推到能力强，但能力强一定能推到绩点高。这就回到一个问题，学习是为什么？高绩点吗？答案并非“一部分是”，而是“完全不是”。绩点是附带，就像3 idiots说的

不要追求成功，成功会在不经意间追上你

二是硬实力和软实力。过去认为两者独立。实则，软实力依赖于硬实力。自己足够强，才能认识到一样强的人，才能收获尊重。大学在很大程度上靠向社会，这不是好事。大学生还远远不到奉献自己的时候，但提升自己的硬实力一刻也不能耽搁。当我想学什么东西时，总会说，先做个计划吧。别，不要浪费时间计划，想学的就立刻去学，不必再等。这学期做过四五次计划，每次计划好近半个月，但全部流产在第一天。

逐渐明朗，我越来越反对高中这类做计划的习惯，但越来越赞同延续高中的学习状态。过去觉得翘课好酷，乖乖上课写作业好蠢，现在看来蠢的是我自己。什么叫大智若愚。

再回想这学期做的事，总体上并不让自己快乐。回顾这二十年，站在现在的立场各个时期都有精彩。但唯独在当时最快乐的体验，是高二一个酷热的中午，在深中新建好的图书馆里吹着空调，耳机里在放轻音乐，写物理必刷题。
